title: Veteran Trader Peter Brandt Explains Why He Criticized XRP In Earlier Years
body: Veteran trader Peter Brandt, a well-known figure in the financial trading world, recently addressed the XRP community in a post on X. Brandt has been a long-standing critic of XRP, often highlighting its volatility and perceived shortcomings compared to Bitcoin. In his message, Brandt offered an olive branch to the XRP army, acknowledging past criticism and clarifying his perspective. Brandt‚Äôs post reflects a notable shift in tone. He admitted to taking hard shots at XRP and its holders over the years. He acknowledged that some of the backlash he received in return was justified, even calling certain comments from XRP supporters funny and creative. Brant‚Äôs comments come a few days after Mr. Intuitive, a well-respected member of the XRP community, called him out and drew attention to his previous stance against XRP. Despite his earlier criticisms, Brandt emphasized that his comments were not personal attacks on XRP investors but rather critiques of the broader narrative surrounding the asset. Reasons For Brandt‚Äôs Criticism Explaining his past stance, Brandt shared insights from his extensive career in trading, which began in 1981. He highlighted the importance of preserving his capital, particularly in volatile markets. He emphasized XRP‚Äôs history of significant losses against Bitcoin, which ranged from 80% to as high as 97%, as a major factor behind his skepticism. For Brandt, holding an asset with such dramatic declines against a more stable alternative contradicted sound trading principles. While Brandt reiterated his belief that Bitcoin serves as the store of wealth standard in the cryptocurrency space, he clarified that his criticisms were directed at the defense of XRP‚Äôs steep declines, not the ambition of its holders to achieve financial success. Brandt also expressed happiness for the recent success of XRP holders, noting that he takes pride in seeing other traders succeed. He maintained, however, that his trading philosophy remains centered on cutting losses quickly and allowing profitable trades to grow. He explained that his faith is rooted in disciplined trading, not unwavering commitment to any asset. An Olive Branch to $XRP holders Accept it if you will, reject it if you must, but I offer it with good intent Over the years I have taken some hard shots at you and your $XRP asset. I admit my rudeness. You've now had your chance to return the "favor." I get it. Some of your‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/KIXdbz4gpJ ‚Äî Peter Brandt (@PeterLBrandt) January 12, 2025 We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 A Final Statement on XRP Despite extending this olive branch, Brandt was firm in his closing remarks. He reiterated his belief that holding assets prone to extreme volatility is not sustainable for wealth accumulation. He also declared that this would be his final post about XRP, leaving the community with a choice to accept or reject his gesture. This marks a significant moment for the XRP community. While his stance on XRP has softened, it seems the community‚Äôs willingness to forgive Cardano creator Charles Hoskinson was not extended to him. This reluctance has likely pushed him away from publicly supporting the asset. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post Veteran Trader Peter Brandt Explains Why He Criticized XRP In Earlier Years appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: Standard Chartered Warns Bitcoin Could Drop Another 10% If It Falls Below $90K
body: Standard Chartered Warns Bitcoin Could Drop Another 10% If It Falls Below $90K Bitcoin (BTC) faces the risk of a 10% short-term decline if its price falls below $90,000 , according to Geoff Kendrick , head of digital asset research at Standard Chartered. In a recent investor note, Kendrick emphasized that macro-economic uncertainty and market sentiment could drive additional panic selling . However, he also projected a $200,000 price target by the end of 2025 , contingent on institutional inflows under the Trump administration. Bitcoin‚Äôs Key Support at $90K Risk of a 10% Drop Standard Chartered highlighted $90,000 as a critical support level: Break Below $90K: A breach could trigger an additional decline of 10% , pushing Bitcoin to $81,000 . Market Sentiment: Panic selling and macroeconomic concerns may exacerbate downward pressure. Price Action Context Bitcoin has already approached the $90,000 threshold, reflecting increased volatility following the U.S. election and recent macroeconomic developments. Macro Factors Affecting Bitcoin‚Äôs Price Spot ETF Performance Break-Even Point Reached: Spot Bitcoin ETFs have hit the break-even mark after the U.S. election, leading to reduced upward momentum. ETF-Driven Selling: Profit-taking among ETF holders could contribute to selling pressure near key support levels. Economic Conditions Global Uncertainty: Rising Treasury yields and inflation concerns continue to weigh on risk assets like Bitcoin. Market Liquidity: Tightened financial conditions limit liquidity, increasing Bitcoin‚Äôs vulnerability to sell-offs. Long-Term Outlook: A $200K Target by 2025 Institutional Inflows Under the Trump Administration Kendrick expressed optimism about Bitcoin‚Äôs potential to reach $200,000 by the end of 2025, citing: Pro-Crypto Policies: A second Trump administration is expected to implement crypto-friendly regulations, boosting institutional confidence. Increased Adoption: Anticipated regulatory clarity could attract major institutional inflows, driving demand for Bitcoin. Historical Patterns Post-Halving Growth: Bitcoin‚Äôs halving cycles have historically preceded significant price rallies, aligning with Kendrick‚Äôs projection. Short-Term Strategy for Bitcoin Investors Risk Management Monitor Support Levels: Watch for price movements around $90,000 and prepare for potential declines to $81,000. Diversify Portfolios: Balance Bitcoin holdings with other assets to mitigate volatility risks. Long-Term Perspective Accumulate on Dips: Investors confident in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term potential may view price corrections as buying opportunities. Focus on Fundamentals: Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity and adoption trends support its role as a long-term store of value. Conclusion Standard Chartered‚Äôs analysis underscores the dual nature of Bitcoin‚Äôs current market dynamics. While a break below $90,000 could trigger short-term declines of up to 10% , the potential for institutional inflows under favorable regulatory conditions may drive Bitcoin to $200,000 by the end of 2025 . Investors should remain cautious in the near term while considering Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term growth trajectory as a foundational asset in the cryptocurrency market. title: Crypto Ball in Washington D.C. to Highlight Policy Shifts and Industry Growth
body: Crypto Ball in Washington D.C. to Highlight Policy Shifts and Industry Growth The highly anticipated Crypto Ball , hosted by the Trump administration‚Äôs crypto czar David Sacks , is set to take place on January 17, 2025 , in Washington, D.C. According to Bitcoin.com , the event will bring together major players in the cryptocurrency space, including MicroStrategy , Coinbase , and Mara Holdings , who are participating as sponsors. The event is fueling speculation about potential announcements regarding policy shifts that could impact the crypto industry. Event Details and Sponsors VIP Ticket Packages The Crypto Ball offers exclusive ticket packages: VIP Reception Tickets: Priced at $100,000 , these tickets grant access to high-level networking opportunities. $1 Million Package: Includes four reception tickets and one dinner ticket with President Donald Trump, making it one of the most exclusive crypto-related events of the year. Sponsor Lineup Major sponsors include: MicroStrategy: Known for its massive Bitcoin holdings. Coinbase: A leading cryptocurrency exchange and advocate for regulatory clarity. Mara Holdings: A prominent blockchain infrastructure company focused on Africa. Significance of the Crypto Ball Focus on Policy Shifts With key industry leaders and policymakers in attendance, the Crypto Ball is expected to serve as a platform for discussing regulatory updates: Pro-Crypto Legislation: Speculation is growing that the event could hint at the Trump administration‚Äôs plans for crypto-friendly policies. Decentralized Finance (DeFi): The event might also address the evolving role of DeFi in the broader financial ecosystem. Industry Networking Collaboration Opportunities: Attendees include top executives, investors, and innovators, making the Crypto Ball a key event for networking. Strengthening Ties: Partnerships between the government and crypto enterprises may emerge, fostering mutual growth. The Trump Administration‚Äôs Role in Crypto The Trump administration has signaled support for cryptocurrency innovation: Creation of a Bitcoin Reserve: Proposed plans to establish a national Bitcoin reserve highlight the administration‚Äôs commitment to blockchain technology. Crypto Advisory Council: The appointment of David Sacks as crypto czar underscores the administration‚Äôs focus on regulatory clarity and growth. Industry Expectations Potential Announcements The Crypto Ball could provide insights into: Stablecoin Regulation: Addressing concerns around stablecoins and their role in the economy. Tax Policy Adjustments: Simplifying crypto tax reporting to encourage adoption. Market Impact Major announcements at the event could influence investor sentiment and market trends, particularly for Bitcoin and other leading cryptocurrencies. Conclusion The Crypto Ball on January 17, 2025, promises to be a landmark event for the cryptocurrency industry, with participation from top companies and policymakers. Hosted by David Sacks, the event raises hopes for significant policy developments and stronger collaboration between the crypto sector and the U.S. government. As the industry looks ahead to this exclusive gathering, its outcomes could shape the next phase of crypto growth and regulation in the United States. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Will Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Hit $3 In January?
body: Dogecoin price surged by 10%, becoming among the top gainers today. Bulls regained momentum following a brief market decline. The price broke past the $0.36 resistance level, fueling optimism among investors. Analysts are now closely monitoring DOGE, citing the potential for further growth. Like BTC and ETH, Dogecoin is capturing renewed attention, with speculations rising about its ability to hit $3 this month. Is Dogecoin Price Set to Hit $3 in January? A crypto analyst predicts Dogecoin price could reach $3.00, citing Fibonacci retracement patterns and historical trends. Currently Dogecoin hovering above at $0.35, the projection suggests a massive 8x rally. While optimism grows, skeptics warn of market dependencies. Investors await signs of a breakout as Dogecoin‚Äôs popularity continues to fuel speculation. Source: X Dogecoin price could be poised for significant gains as market momentum in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and Dogecoin gathers steam. Bitcoin‚Äôs current surge to $9,000 and increased activity in meme coins like SHIB, PINGU, WIF, and BONK could positively influence Dogecoin‚Äôs trajectory. Analysts note that during the 2021 bull cycle, Dogecoin soared over 1,100% within a week of the U.S. Presidential inauguration. As the January 20 inauguration of Donald Trump approaches, speculation grows about its potential impact on Dogecoin‚Äôs price. Market watchers recall the influence of political events and broader crypto adoption during previous rallies. Notably, rumors about Elon Musk heading the Department of Government Efficiency add to the excitement. Experts suggest that Dogecoin could be just one tweet away from a significant pump, reinforcing its reputation as a market-moving asset during key events. Tweet Analyst Predicts Potential Breakout for DOGE in the Short Term Analyst has identified a bullish flag pattern on DOGE on 8-hour timeframe, indicating a potential breakout. If this scenario unfolds, the cryptocurrency could witness a significant upward trend, fueling optimism among traders and investors. According to the analysis, a breakout from the upper resistance line of this channel could trigger a sharp price rally. The projected move suggests a potential price increase of approximately 60%, as indicated by the green breakout zone. Source: X Dogecoin Price Analysis As of Wednesday, the DOGE price was trading at $0.3619, reflecting a strong 10% rise during U.S. trading hours. The price ranged between $0.3428 and $0.3645 throughout the day. A sustained move above the $0.37 mark could spark a new bullish trend. In this case, the Dogecoin price forecast may target the next key resistance near $0.40, with a possibility of climbing toward $0.50. On the downside, initial support lies at $0.35, and a break below $0.34 could lead to further declines. On the 4-hour chart, the MACD indicator is gaining traction in the bullish zone, suggesting momentum could favor an upward trajectory in the near term. Dogecoin price chart: TradingView Dogecoin‚Äôs price shows significant bullish momentum, backed by technical analysis and market activity. Analysts speculate further growth, eyeing $3 as a potential target. However, market conditions remain pivotal. The post Will Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Hit $3 In January? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: JPMorgan Predicts $14 Billion Inflows For Proposed Crypto ETFs If Approved By US SEC
body: JPMorgan Chase & Co. Analysts have made a significant projection regarding the potential impact of a new wave of exchange-traded funds (ETFs) focused on alternative crypto assets. Should these funds receive the green light from the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), they could attract inflows of up to $14 billion, marking a notable development in the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency investments. JPMorgan Highlights Growing Interest In Alternative Crypto ETFs The analysts specifically highlighted the anticipated interest in proposed ETFs for Solana and XRP. They estimate that Solana ETFs could draw between $3 billion and $6 billion within six to twelve months post-approval, while XRP funds might see inflows ranging from $4 billion to $8 billion over the same time frame. Related Reading: Analyst Who Predicted Bitcoin Price Crash To $89,000 Reveals Where BTC Is Headed Next This optimism is grounded in the observed adoption rates of existing spot cryptocurrency ETFs. For context, Bitcoin (BTC) funds currently hold approximately $108 billion in assets, which represents about 6% of Bitcoin‚Äôs market capitalization since their introduction a year ago. Meanwhile, Ethereum (ETH) exchange-traded funds have accumulated $12 billion in just six months, translating to a 3% penetration rate of Ethereum‚Äôs market value. While JPMorgan anticipates that Bitcoin will remain the dominant choice for investors, the interest in Solana and XRP underscores a growing diversification within the crypto investment community. However, the analysts noted that the key question remains: how much demand exists for additional crypto products? They expressed uncertainty about whether the launch of new exchange-traded products (ETPs) will significantly impact the market. Signs Of Industry Growth Post-Trump Election The SEC has recently received numerous applications for funds tracking various cryptocurrencies, including XRP, Solana, and Litecoin. This influx of filings signals a broader industry push to make cryptocurrencies more accessible to retail investors. In addition, the regulatory landscape has been particularly dynamic in light of the recent election of Donald Trump, who has shifted from being a Bitcoin skeptic to a supporter of digital assets. His administration has already shown a willingness to align with the interests of the crypto community, notably by appointing Paul Atkins, a proponent of cryptocurrency, as the new SEC chair, replacing the previous chair Gary Gensler, who was more critical of the industry. Related Reading: Chainlink Weekly Chart Looks Promising ‚Äì If Bulls Reclaim $30 ‚ÄòATH Are Next‚Äô Despite the positive outlook, JPMorgan cautioned that progress on ETFs beyond Bitcoin and Ether may be slow due to the recent change in administration and the ongoing lack of regulatory clarity. Nevertheless, the analysts remain optimistic, predicting that more exchange-traded fund applications will be submitted‚Äîand potentially approved‚Äîin 2025. At the time of writing, XRP is trading at $2.67, posting gains of nearly 6% in the 24-hour time frame. Solana, on the other hand, is trading at $188, up 3% in the same time frame. Featured image from DALL-E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Crypto hedge funds struggle to keep pace with Bitcoin‚Äôs 120% surge in 2024
body: Several crypto hedge funds saw positive returns last year, but none could match Bitcoin‚Äôs remarkable performance, which surged 120% to surpass $100,000 for the first time. In 2024, many crypto hedge funds achieved double-digit returns, with the VisionTrack Composite Index, which tracks the performance of 130 crypto-dedicated hedge funds, jumping 40%, according to data provided by Galaxy‚Äôs VisionTrack. Still, those gains fall short compared to the progress achieved by the leading crypto. Hedge funds struggle to outperform Bitcoin‚Äôs record-breaking surge Several hedge funds strive to distinguish themselves with proprietary or innovative investment strategies that don‚Äôt always involve purchasing the largest digital coin. This means those who didn‚Äôt invest in Bitcoin missed out on its record-breaking returns. David Kalk, founder and CIO of Reflexive Capital, said: ‚Äú2024 was a challenging year for many crypto funds because it was a Bitcoin and memecoins year ‚Äî those were the best assets, and everything else trailed behind.‚Äù David Jeong, CEO of Tread.fi, an algorithmic crypto trading platform for institutional investors, believes that outperforming Bitcoin is tough for crypto hedge funds, as ‚Äúit‚Äôs really hard to time these things.‚Äù Directional and quantitative strategies drive strong performance for crypto hedge funds Nevertheless, according to VisionTrack data, hedge funds focusing on directional and quantitative strategies in the digital asset space posted the best average performance last year. The VisionTrack Quant Directional Index gained over 53%, while the VisionTrack Fundamental Index grew over 40% in the same period. The VisionTrack Market Neutral Index added about 18.5%. Galaxy Digital‚Äôs Alpha Liquid Fund increased by 76.6% in 2024, according to a person familiar with the performance. David Tawil‚Äôs ProChain Master Fund, a multi-strategy crypto fund, gained approximately 70% last year. This follows an 80% surge in 2023 thanks to substantial positions in larger tokens, including Bitcoin. Fundamental research and macro funds, which have strong convictions in crypto assets based on in-depth research of the tokens or blockchain technology, generally performed well. Reflexive Capital, based in San Francisco, saw a net return of 106% in 2024, according to a source familiar with the performance. The Tephra Digital Asset Fund LP, led by former Wall Street professionals Ryan Price and Raghav Chopra, posted approximately 100% gross returns by year-end, compared to 41% the previous year, according to their December letter to investors, dated Jan. 6. According to Galaxy‚Äôs data, most crypto hedge fund gains occurred in the final quarter of 2024. President-elect Donald Trump, once a crypto skeptic, became one of the industry‚Äôs most vocal supporters. His victory in the US presidential election sent Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies to new heights. Adding to Bitcoin‚Äôs stellar year was the successful launch of exchange-traded funds in the US that invest directly in Bitcoin. title: CryptoPunks Floor Price Surges Amid Rumors of IP Rights Sale by Yuga Labs
body: The floor price of CryptoPunks, one of the most iconic non-fungible token (NFT) collections, spiked 13% within three hours on January 14, following rumors that Yuga Labs might sell the intellectual property (IP) rights associated with the collection. The speculation originated from an X post by ‚ÄúWale.moca,‚Äù a researcher at NFT firm Azuki, who cited unnamed sources close to the deal. Market Reacts to CryptoPunks Speculation CryptoPunks‚Äô floor price climbed from 36.6 ETH to 41 ETH, equivalent to over $130,000, as reported by NFT Floor Price data. However, the identity of the potential buyer remains a mystery, with Wale.moca suggesting it isn‚Äôt a Web2 company or an existing NFT brand like Pudgy Penguins, Azuki, or Doodles. This development could mark a major milestone in the NFT space, given CryptoPunks‚Äô dominance as the most valuable NFT collection in the market. According to NFT Price Floor, CryptoPunks boasts a staggering market cap of 414,700 ETH ($1.3 billion), far outpacing competitors such as Pudgy Penguins, which sits at 213,080 ETH . Yuga Labs‚Äô Dominance Yuga Labs acquired the IP rights to 423 CryptoPunks NFTs from Larva Labs in March 2022 for an undisclosed amount. At that time, the collection‚Äôs floor price was around 65 ETH. Despite a 37% decline in ETH-denominated floor price since then, the value of Ether itself has risen over 24%, providing some cushion to the collection‚Äôs overall valuation. Yuga Labs, which also owns the Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) NFT collection, has remained a key player in the NFT ecosystem. BAYC holds the third position in market value among NFTs , further cementing Yuga‚Äôs dominance. In February 2024, Yuga Labs saw a leadership change as co-founder Greg Solano returned as CEO, replacing Daniel Alegre. Solano‚Äôs tenure included a series of layoffs announced in April , with a focus on restoring the company‚Äôs creative-first ethos amidst shifting market dynamics. A Catalyst for the NFT Industry? If Yuga Labs proceeds with selling CryptoPunks‚Äô IP rights, it could redefine the industry‚Äôs approach to intellectual property in digital collectibles. As speculation continues to fuel market activity, investors and NFT enthusiasts are closely watching for confirmation. While the potential deal‚Äôs specifics remain unclear, the surge in CryptoPunks‚Äô floor price underscores the enduring interest in high-value NFTs and the impact of market rumors on digital assets. The post CryptoPunks Floor Price Surges Amid Rumors of IP Rights Sale by Yuga Labs appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: LINK price jumps as Chainlink‚Äôs CCIP upgrade goes live with Cross-Chain Token standards
body: While digital assets recover from the latest dip , the Chainlink team has supercharged the community with bullish news. Chainlink @chainlink ¬∑ Follow The Chainlink CCIP v1.5 upgrade is now live on mainnet for all developers.This release empowers devs to take their tokens cross-chain in a self-serve manner, deploy Cross-Chain Tokens (CCTs) across 20+ blockchains in minutes, & much more.Full details ‚Üì 2:30 am ¬∑ 15 Jan 2025 960 Reply Copy link Read 44 replies That allows all devs to interact with new features for enhanced development activities. For instance, developers can leverage the updated functionalities to move their assets cross-chain. Moreover, they can deploy cross-chain tokens across multiple blockchain platforms within minutes. Chainlink‚Äôs CCIP is an interoperability protocol that developers can leverage to build top-notch applications that send messages, tokens, or both across different chains. The new cross-chain token standard Notably, the latest upgrade introduced the cross-chain token standard, which, according to Chainlink, Enables token developers to integrate new and existing tokens with CCIP in a self-serve manner in minutes. Cross-chain tokens offer developers complete control and ownership, zero-slippage transfers, and improved programmability. Source ‚Äì Chainlink The CCIP v1.5 upgrade marks a vital milestone for enhancing developer experience. It streamlines integrating CCIP across dApps and onboarding existing and new tokens to the cross-chain token standard. Chainlink representative Zach Rynes has already tested the new system. title: Malaysia‚Äôs PM wants to develop crypto and blockchain policies after meeting with CZ and UAE leaders
body: Prime Minister of Malaysia, Anwar Ibrahim, says he wants to explore policies for crypto and blockchain technology after his meeting with Binance co-founder CZ and the Abu Dhabi government. According to a report by media outlet New Straits Times, Ibrahim returned to Malaysia after a three-day visit to Abu Dhabi with plans to start developing policies related to cryptocurrency and blockchain technology so that the nation does not get left behind. Speaking to reporters, the Prime Minister said he had lengthy conversations with the Abu Dhabi government and the former Binance CEO Changpeng ‚ÄúCZ‚Äù Zhao about crypto and blockchain technology. ‚ÄúWe have talked about digital transformation, data centres and artificial intelligence. We now face demands which require us to think about making significant changes,‚Äù said Ibrahim. He claimed that he has requested government agencies such as the Treasury, the Securities Commission, and the national bank, Bank Negara, to study how Malaysia can keep up with the rapid developments of the crypto industry. Ibrahim assured that he will draft a paper on the need for crypto and blockchain technology policies to be presented for review and endorsement by the cabinet as soon as possible. He emphasized the importance of regulations for crypto in order to ‚Äúsafeguard the people‚Äôs interests and prevent leakages.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis innovation is just like AI, which would revamp the financial world. We should not sit idly by and wait and later be forced to do so after others have done it already,‚Äù he said. You might also like: Thailand SEC considers green lighting Bitcoin ETFs as active crypto accounts near 300k Other Southeast Asian countries like Thailand and Singapore have adopted a similar approach to develop their own crypto hubs, following in the footsteps of America‚Äôs incoming administration, which has been vocal about its plans for a more pro-crypto government under President-elect Trump. In addition, Ibrahim wishes to work together with the United Arab Emirates and take notes from them in terms of how to create and implement regulations for the rapidly growing digital asset industry. ‚ÄúThey (UAE leaders) feel that they can forge a close cooperation with Malaysia on this issue. We need to discuss this in detail, leave behind the old business model and give meaning to this digital finance policy,‚Äù said Ibrahim. He hopes the Malaysian government can be more open minded about the new developments and challenges presented in the form of the crypto industry. ‚ÄúAs with all new ideas raised, there will be some concerns. We have to train our personnel, develop competency, and get the players to participate,‚Äù said Ibrahim. Last December, the Malaysian Securities Commission shut down crypto exchange Bybit for operating without a license. The authorities suspended the exchange‚Äôs website and mobile application, ordering the exchange to halt all advertising to Malaysian investors and to close its Telegram channel. Read more: Malaysia‚Äôs Securities Commission cracks down on Bybit for operating without registration

title: CZ on Crypto Investment: ‚ÄòToday Is Earlier Than All the Days to Come‚Äô
body: CZ on Crypto Investment: ‚ÄòToday Is Earlier Than All the Days to Come‚Äô In a recent post on X , Changpeng Zhao (CZ), former CEO of Binance, shared his perspective on cryptocurrency investing with a thought-provoking statement: ‚ÄúToday is earlier than all the days to come.‚Äù Highlighting the importance of acting early in the fast-evolving crypto market, CZ underscored the challenges of identifying opportunities and the regret that often follows missed investments. The Philosophy Behind CZ‚Äôs Statement Why Timing Matters in Crypto CZ‚Äôs message reflects the dynamic nature of the cryptocurrency market, where early movers often reap the greatest rewards: Bitcoin‚Äôs Historical Growth: Early Bitcoin investors saw unparalleled returns, with BTC rising from mere cents to over $90,000. Adoption Curve: Cryptocurrencies are still in the early stages of adoption compared to traditional financial systems, offering significant growth potential. Overcoming Investor Hesitation Many potential investors delay entering the market, only to regret not acting sooner: Fear of Volatility: Concerns about price swings can deter action. Missed Opportunities: As the market matures, the cost of waiting often outweighs the risks of early investment. Why ‚ÄòToday‚Äô Matters More Than Ever Expanding Use Cases The cryptocurrency ecosystem is growing beyond Bitcoin, with applications in decentralized finance (DeFi) , non-fungible tokens (NFTs) , and AI integration creating new opportunities. Institutional Involvement Bitcoin ETFs: The approval of Bitcoin spot ETFs is increasing accessibility for retail and institutional investors alike. Corporate Adoption: Major companies are integrating blockchain technology into their operations, signaling long-term confidence in the sector. Lessons from Missed Opportunities Looking Back at Bitcoin‚Äôs Growth Early Days: In 2010, Bitcoin was worth less than $1, and its potential was largely underestimated. Today‚Äôs Perspective: At over $90,000, Bitcoin continues to demonstrate resilience and value growth, proving early critics wrong. Investor Reflections CZ‚Äôs statement resonates with those who have observed Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory from the sidelines: Regret of Inaction: Many investors wish they had entered the market during its nascent stages. The Importance of Action: Recognizing the current moment as an opportunity could prevent future regret. Navigating the Crypto Market Today Key Strategies for New Investors Start Small: Allocate a portion of your portfolio to crypto investments to minimize risk. Diversify: Explore a mix of large-cap cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and emerging altcoins with growth potential. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Regularly invest small amounts to mitigate the impact of market volatility. For Experienced Investors Stay Informed: Keep up with emerging trends like AI integration, DeFi, and layer-2 solutions. Expand Holdings: Diversify into newer projects that align with long-term market narratives. The Bigger Picture: Crypto‚Äôs Future Potential Adoption and Innovation Cryptocurrencies are at the forefront of technological innovation: Global Financial Inclusion: Blockchain technology offers solutions for the unbanked and underbanked populations. Digital Transformation: From supply chain management to gaming, crypto applications are reshaping industries. The Role of Early Adoption As CZ emphasized, acting early positions investors to capitalize on crypto‚Äôs transformative potential before widespread adoption drives prices higher. Conclusion Changpeng Zhao‚Äôs message, ‚ÄúToday is earlier than all the days to come,‚Äù serves as a timely reminder of the value of early action in cryptocurrency investing. With Bitcoin and the broader crypto market continuing to evolve, seizing opportunities now could prevent future regret over missed chances. Whether you‚Äôre a first-time investor or a seasoned participant, embracing the potential of crypto today may pave the way for long-term success. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: RAI Finance Unveils 2025 Roadmap: AI Integration and Ecosystem Expansion
body: RAI Finance Unveils 2025 Roadmap: AI Integration and Ecosystem Expansion RAI Finance (RAI), a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol, has announced its ambitious 2025 roadmap , signaling major advancements in its platform. In a recent Medium blog post, RAI outlined key objectives including the integration of AI agents , ecosystem expansion, user experience enhancements, and initiatives to foster greater community involvement. These developments aim to solidify RAI‚Äôs position as a leading player in the evolving DeFi landscape. Key Highlights of RAI Finance‚Äôs 2025 Roadmap 1. Integration of AI Agents RAI plans to leverage AI agents to automate and enhance various aspects of its DeFi operations: Optimized Trading: AI agents will enable intelligent trade execution by analyzing market trends in real-time. Portfolio Management: Users can benefit from automated portfolio rebalancing based on individual goals and risk profiles. Fraud Detection: AI systems will bolster security by identifying suspicious activity and preventing malicious transactions. Why It Matters AI integration positions RAI at the forefront of innovation, bridging the gap between DeFi and cutting-edge technologies like artificial intelligence. 2. Ecosystem Expansion RAI aims to broaden its ecosystem through strategic collaborations and cross-chain integrations: Partnerships: Establishing alliances with other DeFi platforms, NFT marketplaces, and blockchain protocols. Cross-Chain Compatibility: Ensuring seamless operations across multiple blockchain networks to increase accessibility and liquidity. Expected Outcomes Enhanced Liquidity: Cross-chain functionality will attract a larger user base and enable smoother asset movement. Diverse Use Cases: Collaboration with other protocols will unlock new applications within the RAI ecosystem. 3. Enhanced User Experience (UX) RAI Finance plans to implement several upgrades to simplify and improve the user journey: Intuitive Interfaces: Redesigned dashboards to ensure ease of navigation for users of all experience levels. Educational Tools: Built-in guides and AI-driven assistants to educate users about DeFi strategies and platform features. Faster Transactions: Infrastructure upgrades to minimize transaction times and reduce fees. 4. Increased Community Involvement RAI emphasizes the importance of community in driving the project forward: Decentralized Governance: Expanding governance mechanisms to give the community greater decision-making power. Incentive Programs: Offering rewards for active participation, such as staking, voting, and contributing to platform improvements. Community-Led Initiatives: Supporting user-driven projects that align with RAI‚Äôs vision. How RAI Finance Stands Out in DeFi RAI Finance‚Äôs roadmap highlights its commitment to addressing key challenges in DeFi, including scalability, security, and accessibility. By integrating AI agents and expanding its ecosystem, RAI seeks to offer users a more intelligent, seamless, and inclusive financial experience. The Future of DeFi with AI Integration The incorporation of AI technology into DeFi could revolutionize the space: Automation: Tasks like risk assessment and portfolio management can be optimized for efficiency and accuracy. Scalability: AI systems enable platforms to scale more effectively while maintaining user trust. Accessibility: AI-driven tools lower entry barriers, making DeFi more approachable for mainstream users. Conclusion RAI Finance‚Äôs 2025 roadmap outlines a transformative vision for the protocol, with AI integration and ecosystem expansion at its core. By focusing on innovation and user engagement, RAI is set to strengthen its position in the competitive DeFi landscape. These initiatives not only benefit the RAI community but also advance the broader adoption of decentralized finance powered by intelligent technology. title: Binance Keeps Making Delist Announcements! "12 More Trading Pairs Delisted!"
body: The world's largest cryptocurrency exchange Binance continues its delisting announcements. At this point, Binance, which first announced that it had delisted the altcoin REEF from futures, made a delisting announcement for 12 more trading pairs. Accordingly, Binance announced that it has delisted the following spot trading pairs: ‚ÄúBNX/BTC, CATI/BNB, CATI/BRL, CHZ/FDUSD, DOGS/BNB, GTC/BTC, HIGH/BTC, LISTA/BRL, NOT/BRL, PIXEL/BTC, TKO/BTC, TWT/BTC‚Äù. ‚ÄúTo protect users and maintain a high-quality trading market, Binance periodically reviews all listed spot trading pairs and may delist certain spot trading pairs due to various factors such as poor liquidity and trading volume. Based on our latest reviews, Binance will remove and suspend trading on the following spot trading pairs: Binance will delisting BNX/BTC, CATI/BNB, CATI/BRL, CHZ/FDUSD, DOGS/BNB, GTC/BTC, HIGH/BTC, LISTA/BRL, NOT/BRL, PIXEL/BTC, TKO/BTC, TWT/BTC trading pairs on 2025-01-17 03:00 (UTC). Binance finally stated that users can continue to trade the altcoins in question on other trading pairs on the platform, and that the delisting of a spot trading pair does not affect the availability of the tokens on Binance Spot. *This is not investment advice. title: This new ETH token takes over P2E market, readies to outperform SHIB
body: Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only. As Ethereum maintains its dominance, emerging tokens like Yeti Ouro are carving out a space in the growing Play-to-Earn gaming sector, offering investors exciting opportunities for 2025. Table of Contents Ethereum forecast for 2025 Yeti Ouro: Can it lead the P2E market? Can Yeti Ouro beat Shiba Inu? Why invest in Yeti Ouro? Conclusion The crypto space is always changing. Established players like Ethereum (ETH) are still dominant, while new tokens like Yeti Ouro (YETIO) are finding their space in the growing Play-to-Earn (P2E) gaming sector. For investors, understanding these assets is key to finding opportunities. Ethereum forecast for 2025 Ethereum , the second largest crypto by market cap, is successful due to its powerful smart contract capabilities and a huge network of decentralized applications (dApps). As of January 14th, 2025, Ethereum price is currently trading at around $3,230.56. Regarding Ethereum‚Äôs 2025 expected price performance, experts are divided. Some say it could go to $6,000 if spot Ether ETFs get approved in the US and institutional money comes in. Others say $5,000 to $15,000, depending on the market and Ethereum‚Äôs progress on scalability solutions. Ethereum‚Äôs upgrades, like Ethereum 2.0 and the switch to proof-of-stake, will lower transaction fees and improve scalability and security. These will make the network more attractive to devs and users and could drive more price growth. Yeti Ouro: Can it lead the P2E market? Yeti Ouro is a new cryptocurrency making moves in the P2E gaming space. Unlike many meme coins without real-world use, YETIO powers the Yeti Go ecosystem, a P2E racing game built on Unreal Engine. Players earn YETIO tokens through gameplay, which can be used for in-game purchases, staked for rewards, or traded. The P2E space is growing; analysts predict it could be a multi-billion dollar industry. Yeti Ouro‚Äôs entry into this growing market means it‚Äôs poised for mass adoption. Its deflationary model with a capped supply and token burn mechanisms adds scarcity, making it attractive to investors looking for assets with long-term value. The team shared a video showcasing the first glance at the Level 1 map at a distance. This is a larger area of the map that uses the same deathmatch style game play. Players have a large surface area to avoid attackers and collect power-ups to help them defeat opponents. There is so much detail yet to be shown, with garages for vehicle repairs and upgrades as well as hidden tunnels and harsh terrains to get through. Can Yeti Ouro beat Shiba Inu? Due to community hype and speculation, Shiba Inu (SHIB) became a meme coin with a big market cap. But with no real use case, it‚Äôs hard to see how it will last. Yeti Ouro combines the community-driven aspect of meme coins with a real use case in P2E. This is a stronger play in the crypto market. During presale, Yeti Ouro returned over 40% The crypto market is unpredictable, but Yeti Ouro has a solid use case and is aligned with a growing industry, so it could outperform Shiba Inu in adoption and value growth. However, it‚Äôs still early for YETIO so there is a large potential upside, so it‚Äôs definitely worth consideration by investors. Why invest in Yeti Ouro? Yeti Ouro has several reasons to invest: Real use case: YETIO is essential to the Yeti Go gaming ecosystem, so there will be steady demand from players. Scarcity: Capped supply and token burns create scarcity, which will drive up the price as demand increases. Market trend: Gaming and blockchain are converging, so Yeti Ouro is in the right place. First mover: Early investors will benefit as the project gains momentum and adoption grows. Conclusion Ethereum is the leading blockchain development platform with high growth potential in 2025. However emerging tokens like Yeti Ouro offer opportunities in niche spaces like P2E gaming. With utility, scarcity, and alignment with market trends, Yeti Ouro could be a good addition to users portfolios and may even beat Shiba Inu. As always, thorough research and careful consideration of risk tolerance are essential before investing in the volatile cryptocurrency market. To learn more about the Yeti Ouro community, visit the website , Twitter, Telegram , and Discord. Users must do their own research before taking any actions related to the company.

title: Cantor Fitzgerald Raises MicroStrategy Price Target to $613 Amid Bitcoin Accumulation
body: Cantor Fitzgerald Raises MicroStrategy Price Target to $613 Amid Bitcoin Accumulation Cantor Fitzgerald has increased its price target for MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock from $518 to $613 , citing the company‚Äôs aggressive Bitcoin acquisition strategy. Brett Knoblauch, Head of Crypto and Digital Assets Research at Cantor Fitzgerald, highlighted MicroStrategy‚Äôs potential to raise $26.7 billion through equity, preferred stock, and debt, allowing the firm to acquire an additional 287,000 Bitcoin (BTC) . This move reflects growing confidence in MicroStrategy‚Äôs position as a corporate Bitcoin powerhouse. MicroStrategy‚Äôs Current Bitcoin Holdings MicroStrategy, co-founded by Michael Saylor, continues to lead the corporate world in Bitcoin holdings: Recent Purchase: On January 12, 2025, the company acquired an additional 2,530 BTC for $243 million , at an average price of $95,972 per Bitcoin . Total Holdings: MicroStrategy now holds 450,000 BTC , purchased at an average price of $62,691 per Bitcoin. Portfolio Value: The total investment amounts to $28.2 billion . Cantor Fitzgerald‚Äôs Optimism: Key Drivers 1. Potential Capital Raise for Bitcoin Purchases Knoblauch pointed to MicroStrategy‚Äôs ability to raise substantial funds to expand its Bitcoin portfolio: Equity Issuance: The company could issue $6.7 billion in equity. Preferred Stock: An additional $2 billion could be raised through preferred stock. Debt Financing: MicroStrategy has the capacity to secure $18 billion in debt , boosting its purchasing power. 2. Strategic Bitcoin Accumulation If fully realized, the raised funds could enable the purchase of approximately 287,000 BTC , further solidifying MicroStrategy‚Äôs dominance as the largest corporate Bitcoin holder. Michael Saylor‚Äôs Vision for Bitcoin Michael Saylor has been a vocal advocate for Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a digital store of value: Corporate Strategy: Saylor views Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and a tool for wealth preservation. Long-Term Confidence: By consistently increasing its holdings, MicroStrategy reinforces its belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term potential. Market Implications of MicroStrategy‚Äôs Strategy Positive Sentiment for Bitcoin MicroStrategy‚Äôs aggressive accumulation supports Bitcoin‚Äôs market perception as a premier asset for institutional adoption. Stock Valuation Boost Cantor Fitzgerald‚Äôs increased price target reflects growing optimism about MicroStrategy‚Äôs business model and its alignment with the rising value of Bitcoin. Broader Corporate Adoption As MicroStrategy sets a precedent, other companies may follow suit, further integrating Bitcoin into their corporate strategies. Risks and Considerations Market Volatility Bitcoin‚Äôs Price Fluctuations: The firm‚Äôs strategy ties its financial health closely to Bitcoin‚Äôs market performance. Debt Risks: Raising significant debt for Bitcoin acquisitions increases financial risk if prices drop substantially. Regulatory Challenges Uncertain Policies: Global regulatory changes could impact Bitcoin‚Äôs adoption and MicroStrategy‚Äôs strategy. Investment Outlook for MSTR Analyst View Cantor Fitzgerald‚Äôs updated price target suggests strong growth potential for MSTR, driven by Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term trajectory and MicroStrategy‚Äôs strategic positioning. Investor Takeaway Bitcoin Exposure: Investing in MSTR provides indirect exposure to Bitcoin, appealing to institutional and retail investors alike. Risk Management: Investors should weigh the volatility of Bitcoin when considering MSTR as part of their portfolios. Conclusion Cantor Fitzgerald‚Äôs decision to raise MicroStrategy‚Äôs price target to $613 highlights the firm‚Äôs growing confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs role in the company‚Äôs strategy. With the potential to acquire an additional 287,000 BTC , MicroStrategy remains at the forefront of institutional Bitcoin adoption. However, investors must consider the risks associated with Bitcoin‚Äôs volatility and the capital-intensive nature of the strategy. As the crypto market evolves, MicroStrategy‚Äôs bold approach continues to set it apart as a leader in the space. title: XDC surge to 3-year high, more gains ahead?
body: XDC, the native token of the layer-1 blockchain, surged to a 39-month high on Jan. 15 after breaking a key resistance level fueled by a new partnership. XDC Network ( XDC ) soared 22% to $0.1231 over the past day, becoming the top gainer among the 100 largest crypto assets per data from CoinGecko. Its market cap stood at over $1.7 billion as of press time. The altcoin‚Äôs price rally was accompanied by a surge in trading volume and open interest in the futures market. Notably, the asset‚Äôs trading volume was up 44% over the past day, hovering over $84 million, while its open interest doubled over the same timeframe to $4.62 million. XDC rallied after the project announced its partnership with the account abstraction platform PillarX, which will integrate XDC into its ecosystem. This would enable the platform‚Äôs users to incorporate XDC into their Web3 activities while benefiting from advanced features like enhanced transaction efficiency and usability. The partnership will also strengthen the XDC Network‚Äôs foothold in the RWA tokenization market by enhancing its accessibility and utility for tokenizing real-world assets through seamless Web3 integration. RWA tokenization allows users to convert physical assets, like real estate, into digital tokens that can be traded on blockchain networks. The XDC Network has previously partnered with Archax, a digital securities exchange and custodian regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority, to promote the adoption of tokenized real-world assets. As such, the project holds the second-largest position in the RWA market, trailing behind only Mantra, which has a market cap of over $3.6 billion. Another factor that has renewed investor confidence in the project is the growth of the XDC Network DeFi ecosystem over the past months. According to DefiLlama, its total value locked in the DeFi ecosystem has surged from $8.5 million at the beginning of November to an all-time high of $31.23 million, as seen on Jan. 15. Further, the altcoin‚Äôs rally was partly supported by Bitcoin‚Äôs march back toward $100k as the broader crypto market recovered following cooler-than-expected inflation data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics. The Crypto Fear and Greed In dex has also shifted back to ‚ÄúGreed‚Äù from the neutral levels seen last week, with a reading of 70 at press time, indicating a risk-on sentiment in the market. You might also like: VIRTUAL price rises as ecosystem tokens AVA, LUNA, aixbt surges XDC price action XDC price, MACD and Supertrend chart | Source: crypto.news On the 1-day XDC/USDT chart, the Moving Average Convergence Divergence indicator suggests that the rally could continue with both MACD and the signal line pointing upwards. This is confirmed by the Supertrend indicator, with the Supertrend line moving below the line to support the bullish outlook. XDC 50-day and 200-day EMA chart | Source: crypto.news The altcoin is also trading above the 50-day and 200-day Moving Averages which means the buying pressure is still up with bulls targeting higher prices, potentially aiming for a new all-time high of $0.19, around 39% higher than the current price of $0.1131. However, the XDC rally could face a pullback before continuing its rally as its price approaches the upper Bollinger Band and the Relative Strength Index nears overbought levels. Another potential driver that could hinder a bullish continuation is increased selling activity observed from retail traders. Over the past day, XDC traders have moved $3.06 million worth of tokens into exchanges, while $2.57 million was withdrawn per CoinGlass data. Increased amounts of cryptocurrency being sent to exchanges is typically a sign that investors could be preparing to sell off their holdings either to cash in profits or rotate funds into a different asset. title: Options Market Assigns 10.62% Probability of ETH Surpassing $4K This Month
body: Options Market Assigns 10.62% Probability of ETH Surpassing $4K This Month Ethereum (ETH) faces a 10.62% probability of surpassing the $4,000 mark by the end of January 2025, according to data from crypto options market leader Deribit . Lin Chen, Head of Business Development for Asia at Deribit, shared the analysis on X, highlighting a cautious outlook amid prevailing macroeconomic uncertainty. Ethereum‚Äôs Current Market Context Price Dynamics As of January 14, ETH is trading below the $4,000 threshold , struggling to regain its footing after a volatile close to 2024. Key Resistance Levels: Analysts point to $4,000 as a psychological barrier and technical resistance level for Ethereum. Market Sentiment: While optimism around Ethereum‚Äôs long-term potential remains intact, short-term sentiment reflects cautious enthusiasm. How the Options Market Derives Probability The 10.62% probability reflects investor sentiment and price expectations based on options market activity: Implied Volatility: The market‚Äôs expectations for price swings over the next few weeks are factored into option premiums. Strike Prices: The $4,000 strike price has attracted limited demand, signaling low confidence in a rapid breakout. Market Conditions: Broader macroeconomic factors and ETH‚Äôs recent performance influence these calculations. Key Factors Impacting Ethereum‚Äôs Outlook Positive Catalysts DeFi Growth: Ethereum continues to dominate the DeFi sector, with increased adoption bolstering its utility. Layer-2 Scaling: The success of solutions like Arbitrum and Optimism is enhancing Ethereum‚Äôs scalability and appeal. Regulatory Optimism: Anticipated pro-crypto policies under the Trump administration could drive institutional interest. Challenges Macroeconomic Uncertainty: Rising U.S. Treasury yields and cautious Federal Reserve policies could weigh on risk assets, including ETH. Competition: Rival blockchains offering faster and cheaper alternatives pose ongoing challenges to Ethereum‚Äôs dominance. Low Trading Volume: Reduced trading activity in the crypto market could hinder ETH‚Äôs ability to breach $4,000. What the 10.62% Probability Means for Investors Cautious Optimism The modest probability reflects market skepticism about ETH‚Äôs short-term ability to exceed $4,000 but acknowledges the potential for unexpected bullish catalysts. Strategic Implications Options Traders: The low probability suggests potential opportunities for higher-risk strategies, such as selling options at the $4,000 strike. Long-Term Investors: Those focused on Ethereum‚Äôs fundamentals may see current levels as an attractive entry point, regardless of near-term fluctuations. Historical Context: Ethereum and $4K Milestones All-Time High: Ethereum‚Äôs peak above $4,800 in November 2021 remains a benchmark for bullish potential. 2023-2024 Trends: ETH‚Äôs struggle to consistently hold above $4,000 highlights the psychological significance of this price point. Conclusion The options market‚Äôs 10.62% probability of Ethereum exceeding $4,000 by the end of January reflects tempered expectations amid challenging market conditions. While Ethereum‚Äôs long-term fundamentals remain strong, investors and traders should approach the current environment with cautious optimism, balancing short-term strategies with a focus on the protocol‚Äôs broader potential. title: Why XRP Price is Up Today?
body: The post Why XRP Price is Up Today? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News January 15 is a very crucial date for the legal battle between Ripple and the US Securities and Exchange Commission. It is the deadline for the regulator to file its opening brief in its appeal against Judge Torres‚Äôs ruling. The situation has created several sensational media headlines. Some have triggered serious discussions on whether the SEC would proceed with its appeal or not. The XRP community appears sharply divided, with some speculating the possibility of abandoning the appeal and others forecasting the probability of it proceeding. Anyway, the ongoing discussions on XRP have benefited the market extensively. In the last 24 hours alone, the market has grown by 12%, outperforming almost all the top ten cryptos. Time to analyse the scenario a little deeper. Ready? XRP Overview: What‚Äôs Happening in the Market At the start of the year, the price of XRP was at $2.08. Since then, the market has surged by 36.53%. Interestingly, between January 4 and 9, the market witnessed a small correction of 7.51%. However, with a sharp upward swing of 13 per cent between January 10 and 11, the market strongly recovered from the correction. In the last three days alone, XRP has increased by nearly 13.79%. The RSI of XRP stands at 68.96 ‚Äì just a few points below the overbought range of 70. This indicators that there is more room for growth in the market. In the last 24 hours, XRP has outperformed the overall crypto market, as well as almost all the top ten cryptos, including Bitcoin (+1.6%), Ethereum (+1.4%), BNB (+0.8%), Solana (+1.4%), and Dogecoin (+4.6%). Will the SEC Abandon the Appeal against Ripple? Even though many XRP enthusiasts suggest that there is little chance for the SEC to pursue the appeal, some experts believe that the regulator is less likely to abandon the appeal, highlighting certain crucial factors, including the recent restructuring of the SEC litigation team leadership with litigators having expertise in handling crypto cases. New SEC Chairman to Join This Month Even if the SEC, led by crypto-skeptic Gary Gensler, proceeds with its tougher stand, the impact will be short-lived, as Gensler is expected to step down from his position, paving the way for the appointment of a pro-crypto executive, Paul Atkins. XRP enthusiasts strongly believe that Atkins would withdraw the SEC‚Äôs appeal against the US court ruling, which partly accepted Ripple‚Äôs argument that XRP is not a security. In conclusion, the legal developments around Ripple and the SEC have boosted XRP‚Äôs market momentum, with its price outperforming major cryptos. While uncertainty remains regarding the SEC‚Äôs appeal, upcoming changes in leadership could significantly impact the case, potentially favouring Ripple. For now, XRP continues to benefit from strong market sentiment and speculation.

title: Sigma Capital Launches $100M Web3 Fund to Fuel Blockchain Innovation in Dubai
body: Sigma Capital Launches $100M Web3 Fund to Fuel Blockchain Innovation in Dubai Sigma Capital , a Dubai-based early-stage venture firm, has unveiled a $100 million fund aimed at accelerating the growth of Web3 startups. The fund will target key areas such as decentralized finance (DeFi) , tokenization, and blockchain infrastructure, while also managing a portfolio of liquid tokens. With Dubai‚Äôs crypto-friendly environment serving as a catalyst, this initiative positions Sigma Capital to drive innovation in the blockchain space. Why Dubai? A Thriving Crypto Ecosystem Supportive Regulations Dubai has emerged as a global hub for blockchain and cryptocurrency innovation: Clear Regulatory Framework: Policies that encourage innovation while protecting investors. Crypto-Friendly Stance: Initiatives like the Dubai Virtual Asset Regulatory Authority (VARA) provide clear guidelines for blockchain enterprises. Attracting Major Players Leading crypto exchanges such as Binance , Crypto.com , and OKX have established operations in Dubai, bolstering its reputation as a center for blockchain innovation. Sigma Capital‚Äôs $100M Web3 Fund: Key Focus Areas 1. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) The fund will prioritize projects that aim to disrupt traditional finance by offering: Lending and Borrowing Platforms: Enabling decentralized financial services. Yield Farming: Innovations to enhance returns for liquidity providers. 2. Tokenization Sigma Capital plans to invest in startups leveraging tokenization for: Real-World Assets: Digitizing assets like real estate, art, and commodities. Securitized Tokens: Enabling fractional ownership and broader access to investment opportunities. 3. Blockchain Infrastructure The fund will support infrastructure projects that strengthen blockchain ecosystems: Scalability Solutions: Enhancing transaction speeds and reducing fees. Interoperability Protocols: Enabling seamless interaction between different blockchains. The Role of Dubai in Web3 Development Dubai‚Äôs focus on blockchain and cryptocurrency has positioned it as a global leader in Web3 innovation: Talent Magnet: The city attracts top talent from around the world with its supportive policies and infrastructure. Government Initiatives: Programs like the Dubai Blockchain Strategy aim to make Dubai a blockchain-powered city by 2030. Strategic Location: Dubai serves as a gateway to both Asian and European markets, facilitating global collaboration. Market Trends: Why Now Is the Time for a Web3 Fund Growing Interest in Web3 Institutional Adoption: Increasing involvement from traditional finance in blockchain and DeFi projects. Mainstream Applications: Expanding use cases in gaming, supply chain, and identity verification. Crypto Market Recovery The recent stabilization of cryptocurrency markets has reignited investor confidence, making this a strategic time for venture capital in Web3. Sigma Capital‚Äôs Competitive Edge Expertise in Early-Stage Ventures Sigma Capital‚Äôs experience in identifying and nurturing early-stage startups positions it as a key player in Dubai‚Äôs blockchain ecosystem. Portfolio Management The fund‚Äôs focus on managing a liquid token portfolio adds flexibility and adaptability to its investment strategy. Global Connections Leveraging Dubai‚Äôs international appeal, Sigma Capital aims to attract startups and partners from across the globe. What This Means for the Web3 Ecosystem Increased Funding Opportunities The $100 million fund provides critical capital for Web3 startups to innovate and scale. Enhanced Collaboration Dubai‚Äôs ecosystem fosters partnerships between startups, established enterprises, and government initiatives. Accelerated Adoption By supporting infrastructure and application development, the fund will contribute to the broader adoption of blockchain technology. Conclusion Sigma Capital‚Äôs $100 million Web3 fund underscores the growing importance of Dubai as a global hub for blockchain and cryptocurrency innovation. By focusing on DeFi, tokenization, and blockchain infrastructure, the fund aims to drive the next wave of Web3 advancements. With clear regulations, a thriving ecosystem, and global appeal, Dubai is set to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of blockchain technology. title: RWA Space to Bolster With Algorand 4.0‚ÄîALGO Price Rally to $1 is Pre-Programmed!
body: The post RWA Space to Bolster With Algorand 4.0‚ÄîALGO Price Rally to $1 is Pre-Programmed! appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto markets faced notable bearish pressure during the past week, which raised concerns over the upcoming price action. Meanwhile, the latest recovery suggests the tokens are on a bullish track as the global market capitalisation surged over $3.5 trillion while the sentiments have again become greedy. In the meantime, Algorand (ALGO) is among the top performers for the day, attracting over double-digit gains, which has raised hopes for an extended bullish action of over 60% in the next couple of weeks, which could elevate the ALGO price above $0.5. The adoption is expected to increase with higher changes of ALGO being used as a mode of payment, wherever Mastercard is accepted. title: Which Crypto Should I Buy In 2025? Punisher Coin, Pepe Coin and Stellar
body: The post Which Crypto Should I Buy In 2025? Punisher Coin, Pepe Coin and Stellar appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News As we begin 2025, a lot of seasoned and new crypto investors are asking themselves the same question; which crypto should I buy in 2025? With so many projects emerging, it can be tough to separate the hype from the true potential. In this article, we‚Äôll compare three popular options: Stellar (XLM), Pepe Coin (PEPE), and Punisher Coin ($PUN). title: 100 Million XRP Moved In Biggest Unknown Whale Transaction In 2025
body: On January 14, 2025, Whale Alert, a well-known blockchain tracking platform, reported a massive XRP transaction. The transfer involved 100,000,000 XRP, valued at $265.47 million, moving from one unknown wallet to another. It‚Äôs worth noting that this is the largest XRP transaction not involving Ripple since December 2024. Such significant movements often prompt speculation about their purpose and implications. 100,000,000 #XRP (265,467,057 USD) transferred from unknown wallet to unknown wallet https://t.co/1ZT2mBAI0s ‚Äî Whale Alert (@whale_alert) January 14, 2025 The Unique Timing Of The Transaction The crypto community is actively debating the potential reasons behind this transaction. With no involvement from Ripple, the movement likely stems from private entities or individuals. The timing of this event has drawn attention, as the cryptocurrency market anticipates a pivotal shift in U.S. regulatory policies on January 20, 2025. On this date, President-elect Donald Trump, a vocal supporter of cryptocurrencies, will take office. Additionally, Gary Gensler, the current Chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), is set to resign , with Paul Atkins, a crypto-friendly figure, nominated as his replacement. Many believe the incoming administration could dismiss the SEC‚Äôs lawsuit against Ripple. This optimism stems from the perception that Atkins and the new administration will be fair toward cryptocurrencies, potentially reducing regulatory hurdles for Ripple and similar entities. This environment may explain the whale activity, as investors position themselves for potential market changes. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Other Potential Explanations The transfer‚Äôs size raises questions about its intent. One possibility is that it represents an institutional interest in XRP, with entities preparing for a bullish market following the anticipated regulatory shift. This transaction could also be part of an internal restructuring by a major entity managing substantial XRP holdings. However, such interpretations remain speculative without clear identifiers for the wallets involved. Historically, significant XRP transactions have occasionally preceded notable market movements. Investors often interpret such activity as a signal of increased confidence in the asset‚Äôs future. The alignment of this transaction with key upcoming events adds to the intrigue. If the Ripple lawsuit is dismissed, XRP‚Äôs market position could strengthen significantly, potentially driving further adoption and investment. XRP whale activity has been rising since December 2024 , and the recent transaction shows the excitement surrounding cryptocurrencies in 2025. The potential for pro-crypto policies under Trump‚Äôs administration has invigorated market participants, and the explosive XRP rally investors have been anticipating for years could finally materialize. title: Tom Lee Predicts Strong Bitcoin Performance in 2025 Despite Short-Term Volatility
body: Tom Lee Predicts Strong Bitcoin Performance in 2025 Despite Short-Term Volatility Fundstrat Capital CIO Tom Lee has predicted that Bitcoin (BTC) will rank among the top-performing assets of 2025 , citing its resilience and strong fundamentals. In a recent interview with CNBC, Lee highlighted that Bitcoin‚Äôs current price of $90,000 offers a ‚Äúgood entry point‚Äù for long-term investors, despite acknowledging the potential for short-term dips to $70,000 or even $50,000 . Bitcoin‚Äôs Price Action and Current Entry Point Why $90,000 Is Attractive Resilience: Bitcoin has demonstrated strength during recent market turbulence, maintaining levels above $90,000. Long-Term Value: Lee emphasized that buyers at this level are unlikely to lose money over time. Potential Downside Short-Term Dips: $70,000: A pullback to this level would align with historical corrections. $50,000: While less likely, such a dip could present a significant buying opportunity. Lee‚Äôs Optimism: Early Halving Cycle Impact Lee attributes much of Bitcoin‚Äôs potential for outperformance in 2025 to its position within the early stages of a halving cycle. Halving Dynamics Supply Reduction: Bitcoin‚Äôs halving, which occurs approximately every four years, reduces block rewards by 50%, tightening supply. Price Impact: Historically, halvings have preceded major bull runs, as reduced supply coincides with increased demand. Two Potential Scenarios for Bitcoin in 2025 Scenario 1: Minor Correction Before Rally Drop to $70,000: A mild pullback could allow Bitcoin to consolidate before resuming an upward trajectory. Investor Confidence: Such a correction is unlikely to deter long-term investors. Scenario 2: Deeper Correction with Strong Recovery Drop to $50,000: In this case, macroeconomic pressures or unexpected events could trigger a steeper decline. Recovery Potential: Bitcoin‚Äôs history of rebounding strongly from bear markets suggests a rally could follow. Macro Factors Supporting Bitcoin‚Äôs Growth Institutional Adoption ETFs: The approval of Bitcoin spot ETFs has increased accessibility for institutional investors. Global Hedge: Bitcoin continues to be seen as a hedge against inflation and economic instability. Regulatory Optimism Trump Administration: Anticipated pro-crypto regulations under the new administration are fueling investor confidence. Investment Strategy for 2025 For Long-Term Investors DCA Strategy: Dollar-cost averaging (DCA) can mitigate the impact of short-term volatility. Focus on Fundamentals: Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity and institutional interest support its long-term value proposition. For Traders Key Levels to Watch: Support: $70,000 and $50,000 as potential buying zones. Resistance: Breaking above $100,000 could trigger a new bull market phase. Risk Management: Use stop-loss orders to minimize exposure to unexpected downturns. Conclusion Tom Lee‚Äôs forecast underscores Bitcoin‚Äôs potential to shine as a top-performing asset in 2025, despite the possibility of short-term volatility. With a current price of $90,000, Bitcoin offers an attractive entry point for long-term investors, particularly as it enters the early stages of a halving cycle. While dips to $70,000 or even $50,000 remain possibilities, Lee‚Äôs analysis highlights the robust recovery potential that has historically defined Bitcoin‚Äôs market cycles. title: U.S. Spot Ethereum ETFs Face $39.52M Net Outflows Amid Market Uncertainty
body: U.S. Spot Ethereum ETFs Face $39.52M Net Outflows Amid Market Uncertainty U.S. spot Ethereum (ETH) exchange-traded funds (ETFs) experienced a combined net outflow of $39.52 million on January 13, 2025 , marking the fourth consecutive day of withdrawals. This data, reported by Trader T on X (@thepfund), highlights continued cautious sentiment among investors. While most ETFs recorded outflows, BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA bucked the trend with $12.81 million in net inflows , signaling mixed market dynamics. Breakdown of Ethereum ETF Activity Major Net Outflows Grayscale‚Äôs mini ETH: Registered the largest outflow at $37.84 million . Grayscale ETHE: Reported an additional $14.49 million in net outflows. Positive Inflow BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA: Contrasted the broader trend with $12.81 million in net inflows, showing selective investor confidence. Other ETFs No significant inflows or outflows were reported across remaining Ethereum ETFs. Market Sentiment: Factors Driving Outflows Macro Uncertainty Economic Data: Recent strong U.S. labor reports and rising Treasury yields have heightened concerns about tighter financial conditions. Federal Reserve Policies: Uncertainty over potential interest rate hikes continues to weigh on risk assets, including Ethereum. Profit-Taking Behavior Recent ETH Rally: Ethereum‚Äôs price increases in late 2024 prompted profit-taking among investors, contributing to ETF outflows. BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA: A Positive Outlier Why ETHA Attracted Inflows BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA recorded $12.81 million in inflows, reflecting targeted investor interest: Institutional Trust: BlackRock‚Äôs reputation may have driven confidence during a volatile period. Diversification Strategies: Some investors may be reallocating funds to BlackRock‚Äôs ETF as part of portfolio adjustments. Impact on Ethereum Prices Short-Term Pressure Price Volatility: Sustained outflows from major ETFs like Grayscale‚Äôs mini ETH and ETHE could increase selling pressure on Ethereum. Market Liquidity: Reduced demand in the ETF market may lead to thinner liquidity, affecting price stability. Long-Term Outlook Growth Potential: Despite short-term challenges, Ethereum‚Äôs fundamentals, including its role in decentralized finance (DeFi) and NFTs, remain strong. Institutional Adoption: Continued interest from major players like BlackRock suggests optimism for Ethereum‚Äôs long-term trajectory. Investor Takeaways Monitor ETF Trends Keep an eye on net inflow and outflow trends in spot ETFs, as they provide insights into broader market sentiment. Diversify Investments Diversification across multiple assets and ETFs can help mitigate risks associated with market fluctuations. Long-Term Focus Short-term outflows may create buying opportunities for investors confident in Ethereum‚Äôs growth potential. Conclusion The $39.52 million net outflows from U.S. spot Ethereum ETFs on January 13 highlight ongoing market uncertainty and investor caution. While Grayscale‚Äôs ETFs faced significant withdrawals, BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA stood out with notable inflows, signaling selective confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs future. As macroeconomic factors continue to influence market dynamics, investors are advised to balance short-term caution with long-term optimism about Ethereum‚Äôs potential. title: Gary Gensler: Bitcoin Is Highly Speculative, But 7 Billion People Want to Trade It
body: Gary Gensler: Bitcoin Is Highly Speculative, But 7 Billion People Want to Trade It In a recent CNBC interview , Gary Gensler , Chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), described Bitcoin (BTC) as a highly speculative asset. However, he acknowledged its global appeal, noting that seven billion people want to trade it. According to Watcher Guru on X, Gensler likened Bitcoin‚Äôs significance to that of gold , which has been a store of value for over 10,000 years . Gensler also reaffirmed his intention to resign from his position as SEC Chairman on January 20, 2025 . Bitcoin as a Global Asset Gensler‚Äôs Gold Comparison Gensler‚Äôs statement draws a parallel between gold and Bitcoin: Historical Store of Value: Gold has served as a reliable store of value for millennia. Modern Digital Gold: Bitcoin, often referred to as digital gold , has become a sought-after asset due to its decentralized nature and scarcity. Global Demand for Bitcoin Gensler suggested that Bitcoin‚Äôs popularity transcends borders and demographics: Widespread Appeal: The fact that seven billion people desire access to Bitcoin underscores its potential as a universal asset. Speculative Nature: Despite its appeal, Gensler warned that Bitcoin remains speculative and subject to volatility. Gensler‚Äôs Tenure as SEC Chairman As SEC Chairman , Gensler played a significant role in regulating cryptocurrencies: Crypto Regulation Stance: He has consistently emphasized the need for clear regulations to protect investors in the rapidly evolving crypto market. Spot ETF Approval Delays: Under his leadership, the SEC delayed several Bitcoin spot ETF applications, contributing to regulatory uncertainty. Upcoming Resignation January 20 Departure: Gensler‚Äôs decision to step down marks a pivotal moment for U.S. crypto regulation, as his successor will inherit key regulatory challenges. The Debate Around Bitcoin‚Äôs Speculative Nature Volatility Concerns Bitcoin‚Äôs price has been characterized by significant fluctuations: 2021 to Present: Bitcoin‚Äôs rise from $10,000 to over $60,000 and subsequent corrections illustrate its volatile nature. Investor Risk: Gensler‚Äôs remarks serve as a reminder that Bitcoin‚Äôs value is influenced by market sentiment and macroeconomic factors. Institutional Adoption Despite Gensler‚Äôs cautionary remarks, Bitcoin‚Äôs adoption continues to grow: Spot ETFs: Institutional investors are eyeing Bitcoin spot ETFs as a way to access the asset through regulated financial products. Corporate Holdings: Companies like MicroStrategy and Tesla continue to hold significant Bitcoin reserves. Global Interest in Trading Bitcoin Bitcoin‚Äôs global popularity is driven by several factors: Decentralization: Bitcoin operates without central control, appealing to those seeking alternatives to traditional financial systems. Cross-Border Transactions: Its borderless nature makes it ideal for international transactions and remittances. Store of Value: Many investors view Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and economic instability. Gensler‚Äôs Impact on the Crypto Market Mixed Legacy Gensler‚Äôs tenure as SEC Chairman has had a mixed impact on the crypto industry: Push for Regulation: His efforts to regulate the market were welcomed by some as necessary for investor protection. Industry Frustration: However, delays in approving Bitcoin ETFs and enforcement actions against crypto firms frustrated industry stakeholders. The Road Ahead With Gensler stepping down, the crypto industry awaits new leadership that could shape future regulatory approaches. Conclusion Gary Gensler‚Äôs assertion that seven billion people want to trade Bitcoin highlights the cryptocurrency‚Äôs global appeal despite its highly speculative nature. As he prepares to resign as SEC Chairman, his remarks serve as both a cautionary note and a testament to Bitcoin‚Äôs evolving role as a modern-day digital gold . Investors and regulators alike will continue to navigate the balance between opportunity and risk in the world of cryptocurrencies. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Why Is the Cardano (ADA) Price Up Today?
body: TL;DR ADA jumped to $1.05, possibly driven by overall market recovery, whale purchases, and Cardano partnership rumors. Analysts predict the asset could reach $1.20 soon, with long-term targets as high as $7 based on technical patterns and upcoming developments. What Caused the Pump? Cardano‚Äôs ADA is among the best-performing cryptocurrencies today (January 15), with its price soaring to a one-week high of approximately $1.05 (per CoinGecko‚Äôs data). Its market capitalization jumped above $37 billion, thus solidifying the asset‚Äôs position in crypto‚Äôs top 10 club . ADA Price, Source: CoinGecko Perhaps the most obvious reason fueling the rally is the overall resurgence of the digital asset market. Bitcoin (BTC), whose price briefly dipped below $90K a few days ago, is now worth around $97,000. Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP) , and many others have also charted impressive gains in the last 24 hours. Another factor could be the whale activity. The popular X user Ali Martinez revealed that such large investors have accumulated more than 100 million ADA (worth over $100 million) in the past 48 hours. Whale purchases reduce the available supply, potentially creating buying pressure and pushing prices higher due to basic economic principles. The move often signals confidence in the asset, encouraging smaller players to follow suit, further amplifying the upward price movement. Last but not least , ADA‚Äôs latest pump could be attributed to the speculations about an upcoming partnership between Ripple and Cardano. The leaders of the two entities have held discussions in the past few months. Most recently, Cardano‚Äôs founder Charles Hoskinson hinted the possible collaboration could involve the integration of Ripple‚Äôs stablecoin: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve already had a call with the RLUSD people. We are actively talking.‚Äù ADA Predictions Many market observers think Cardano‚Äôs native token has yet to reach new peaks. X user Ssebi claimed the asset had formed a ‚Äúbig W pattern‚Äù on its price chart. According to them, ADA is headed toward $1.20 because it broke the $1.02 depicted resistance. Others who weighed in lately include Dan Gambardello and Altcoin Daily. The former believes ADA has ‚Äúone of the most bullish weekly pattern setups in crypto,‚Äù envisioning a potential price explosion¬†to as high as $7. Altcoin Daily made optimistic forecasts about numerous cryptocurrencies at the start of the year, predicting that ADA‚Äôs valuation might reach $6.45 sometime in 2025. Meanwhile, Cardano is poised for significant advancements over the next 12 months that could drive its token‚Äôs price higher .
