title: XLM Price Up By 7%: Will Stellar Follow XRP‚Äôs Path?
body: As of 15 January 2025, the Stellar (XLM) price is up 7% in the last 24 hours and currently trades at $0.4705, with a market cap of $14.55B. This upward movement raises the question about whether XLM can mirror XRP‚Äôs path, and register similar yet impressive gains? XLM Price Analysis: What‚Äôs Next for Stellar After Breakout? After a sharp rise of 600% in November 2024, Stellar price has been trading inside the Symmetric Triangle pattern since Nov 2024. After days of consolidation, altcoin has breached the technical formation to the upside coupled with strong volumes. This development suggests Stellar is ready for a bullish move. The chart indicates a breakout around $0.4500 level. By calculating the pattern height, approx 132%, and adding it to the breakout level, then the projected price is approximately near $1.0566. If bullish momentum holds then the Stellar price could reach its target soon. The bullishness displayed by the technical formation is confirmed as XLM trades above the 20-day, 50-day, 100-day, and 200-day Moving Averages, showcasing strength. Additionally, the MACD indicator shows bullish momentum with rising histograms. This is in line with the RSI, which also indicates an uptick in buying pressure. XLM/USDT 1-day chart All in all, the outlook for Stellar price prediction hints a target of $1.0566. Experts are also of the same opinion and expect XLM to shoot higher. Expert Forecasts Bullish Future for Stellar (XLM) Crypto expert Javon Marks recently shared a bullish outlook on Stellar Lumens (XLM) in his latest tweet on X. Following its impressive bullish performance, the momentum suggests even more gains could be on the horizon. With growing buying pressure and supportive market conditions, $XLM seems ready for substantial growth if these key resistance levels are surpassed. XLM/USDT 5 Day Chart With technicals hinting at another 54% move to $0.681 and experts forecasting a similar outlook, XLM price looks primed for a breakout rally. A break above $0.681 could pave the way for XLM to aim for $1.29 in the short term. Market Sentiment Shift According to Coinglass data, The total liquidation in the last 24 hours was $2.34 Million with $542.88K coming from long positions and $1.80 million from short positions, indicating a major shift in the crypto market . XLM Liquidation Rising Open Interest and Trading Volume XLM Open Interest Soar by 38.33% to $321.07 million and the trading volume also increased by 36.66% to $1.07B. The sharp rise in Open Interest and Trading Volume indicates that investors are heavily speculating on Stellar‚Äôs XLM token. XLM Open Interest What Next For XLM? Currently, XLM price is facing a key resistance level at $0.4900, which could determine its short-term direction. A breakout above this level might trigger a rally toward $0.5600 and $0.6400, marking significant gains. However, failure to clear $0.4900-$0.5000 could lead to a retracement, with support levels identified at $0.4500 and $0.3900. title: 5 Crypto Coins to Hold for Long-Term Profit
body: Cryptocurrency prices have staged a mild recovery this week, a trend that may continue if the United States releases weak inflation numbers. They may also rebound ahead of the upcoming Donald Trump inauguration and Gary Gensler‚Äôs resignation. So, here are some of the best crypto coins to buy and hold for long-term profits. Best Crypto Coins To Buy And Hold Bitcoin is one of the best crypto coin to buy and hold for long-term profit. However, it is not an affordable investment with each coin going for almost $100,000. Some of the best cryptocurrencies to buy and hold are IOTA (IOTA), Virtuals Protocol (VIRTUAL), Binance Coin (BNB), Solana (SOL), and Ripple (XRP). IOTA (IOTA) IOTA is a top crypto coin to buy and hold because of its upcoming turnaround efforts that may make it a viable alternative to Ethereum and Solana. The network will launch the Rebased upgrade soon that will introduce new features like staking and smart contracts. It is also going through a governance vote that will unlock 44 million tokens that will be used to promote the network. It has also partnered with LayerZero , a top scaling project. IOTA Rebased Image As such, IOTA price is a big bargain as it trades at $0.36, down by 85% from its all-time high. That means that it may rebound and retest $2.65 in the near term. On top of that, the coin will be yielding between 10% and 15%. Virtuals Protocol (VIRTUAL) Virtuals Protocol is another top crypto coin to buy and hold because of the ongoing demand for AI agent tokens and its growing ecosystem. The network houses some of the biggest AI agent tokens in the industry like GAME, Iona, Olyn, and aixCB, which have accumulated millions of dollars in assets . VIRTUAL was one of the best-performing coins in 2024 and has more room to run in the long term because of its market share. Binance Coin (BNB) Binance Coin is a good cryptocurrency to buy because of its strong technicals. In this BNB price forecast , we noted that technicals pointed to a surge from about $650 to $1,000 in this bull run. BNB also has other catalysts like the fact that it burns tokens worth over $1 billion each quarter and that its ecosystem is still growing. Binance Coin generates a 7% staking yield, making it one of the highest-yielding crypto projects. Solana (SOL) Solana is another popular crypto token to buy because of its crucial role in the crypto industry, where it has become the second-biggest blockchain in the industry. It houses some of the top crypto projects like Orca, Raydium, and Jupiter. It also has the biggest market share in the meme coin industry and has a 5% staking yield, making it a good coin to stake. Ripple (XRP) XRP is a good crypto coin to buy because of several tailwinds. The RLUSD stablecoin is gaining market share in the industry. XRP meme coins have started surging, and there are rising odds that the SEC will approve a Ripple ETF in 2025. All these catalysts, together with its strong technicals, mean that it will have a strong bullish breakout. Other Good Cryptocurrencies To Buy The other fast-growing cryptocurrencies to buy because of their substantial catalysts are XDC Network, Raydium, Stellar Lumens, and Injective. title: Karpous releases Closed Alpha Wth Full Launch Set For Q2 2025‚ÄîRedefining Investment With AI-Driven cDe-Fi Innovation
body: Karpous, a pioneering force in the financial technology sector, plans to transform the investment landscape with its groundbreaking centralized, decentralized finance (cDe-Fi) platform. The platform removes the difficulties typically associated with asset tokenization and provides investors with access to a wide range of real-world assets (RWAs). Karpous achieves this by integrating the strengths of centralized finance (CeFi) and decentralized finance (DeFi). Overview of the Karpous Platform Karpous is a leading cDe-Fi platform that streamlines global asset investment by cutting off the need for tokenized RWAs and simplifying regulatory complexities. The platform empowers users to become asset managers, owners, and active participants, enabling them to fully capitalize on the platform‚Äôs growth by merging a centralized marketplace with decentralized wallet security. Karpous sets a new benchmark for accessing emerging RWA opportunities through its community-centric model. Karpous Brings A New Era In Real-World Asset Investment The global market for RWAs is on its way to reach an estimated $16 trillion by 2030. This underscores the immense potential in this sector. Nevertheless, regulatory obstacles and complex compliance requirements, especially with regard to asset tokenization, have frequently made investment in RWAs difficult. By eliminating the necessity for tokenization, the platform solves these problems, simplifying the investment process and democratizing access to a wide spectrum of global opportunities. Notably, the platform has been offering High Net Worth Individuals (HNWI) a secure and compliant environment for exploring foreign investment options since its launch in 2024. Karpous is currently undergoing rigorous closed alpha testing. This will enhance its infrastructure‚Äîensuring top-tier security. The alpha testing phase is a precursor to the highly anticipated open alpha launch, which is scheduled for the second quarter of 2025. Open alpha will feature the full integration of advanced web3 components. Innovative Features of the Karpous Platform Karpous distinguishes itself through a suite of innovative features designed to empower both retail and institutional investors: Non-Tokenized Asset Access Investors can engage with diverse opportunities without navigating the regulatory complexities associated with tokenized assets. Dynamic Staking Mechanism The platform introduces a novel staking model incorporating time-value accrual and gradual unlocking, rewarding active users and fostering sustained engagement. AI-Driven Asset Vetting and Insights Karpous employs cutting-edge AI to analyze asset quality, market trends, and risk factors, providing transparent insights to investors. This ensures informed decision-making and trust across the platform while simplifying the investment process. Community-Driven Governance Through KarpousDAO, users can influence platform policies, approve assets, and contribute to the platform‚Äôs evolution, ensuring a community-centric approach to governance. Attractive Early Adopter Program Karpous has allocated up to 35% of its token supply to early supporters, promoting equitable opportunities for asset investment and encouraging early participation. Investment Pools Tailored for diverse strategies, these pools facilitate seamless collaboration between asset managers and investors, enabling the creation of specialized investment approaches. Bridging CeFi and DeFi: The cDe-Fi Model Karpous embodies the cDe-Fi model by combining the reliability of centralized finance with the security and autonomy of decentralized finance. This hybrid approach offers user-friendly interfaces and robust compliance associated with centralized marketplaces, while ensuring that actual asset ownership and security keys remain in the hands of the community. This fusion provides investors the best of both worlds, enhancing trust and participation. A Vision for a Global Investment Community More than just an investment platform, Karpous aspires to become a global hub for RWA traders, DeFi enthusiasts, and professional asset managers. Investors seeking to diversify beyond local markets can access curated global assets, while seasoned asset managers have the tools to construct specialized strategies within dedicated investment pools. This inclusive approach fosters a vibrant community of investors and managers collaborating towards shared financial goals. Strategic Roadmap and Future Prospects With a comprehensive roadmap that includes centralized and blockchain-integrated features set to launch in 2025, Karpous is poised to become a leader in the cDe-Fi space. Karpous addresses regulatory challenges and prioritizes user inclusion, laying the foundation for a global financial ecosystem accessible to all. The platform is at the forefront of the changing financial landscape because of its dedication to innovation and community-driven development. Conclusion Karpous is at the forefront of transforming how global investors access and engage with real-world assets. The platform sets a new standard in the cDe-Fi space by eliminating tokenization hurdles and blending the best centralized and decentralized finance. Its commitment to community-driven governance, innovative features, and regulatory simplicity positions it as a beacon for the future of investment. With a roadmap aimed at expanding opportunities and fostering inclusivity, Karpous is not just reshaping finance; it‚Äôs creating a global movement that empowers individuals to redefine their financial potential. Visit the project‚Äôs website for more details. Could this be the moment that XRP‚Äôs price breaks its ATH? XRP ETFs Could Bring $3-8 Billions JPMorgan recently forecasted that XRP exchange-traded funds (ETFs) could attract a massive $3 billion to $8 billion in investments during their first year. This prediction has made waves in the cryptocurrency world, and it‚Äôs not just JPMorgan saying it‚Äôs possible. Senior Bloomberg ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas has joined the conversation, stating that JPMorgan‚Äôs estimate is a ‚Äúpretty reasonable guess.‚Äù JPMorgan is saying that alt-coin ETF will collect $14b in flows in first year, $3-6b for Solana and $4-8b for XRP. My team hasn't made any formal predictions yet but this seems like a pretty reasonable guess. Gotta get the approvals first tho. Story via @isabelletanlee ‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/Rc4rLIsJim ‚Äî Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) January 14, 2025 His endorsement brings additional credibility to the optimistic outlook for XRP and other altcoins like Solana, which are expected to benefit from a similar wave of investment once their respective ETFs launch. The Rise of XRP and Solana ETFs The success of Bitcoin ETFs in 2024 has set a high bar for altcoins like XRP and Solana. Experts believe that these altcoins could soon see the same influx of investment as Bitcoin did. According to JPMorgan‚Äôs report projects that XRP ETFs could tap into a 3% to 6% market penetration, resulting in $3 billion to $8 billion in investments. Solana, another favorite in the space, could see $3 billion to $5 billion in ETF inflows in their first year. SOL & XRP ETPs Could Attract $3-8bn Each: JPM ETP assets ($108bn) make up 6% of the total Bitcoin market cap ($1,874bn) after the ETPs‚Äô first year of trading; likewise, ether ETP assets ($12bn) have a 3% penetration rate of the total Ethereum market cap ($395bn) within its first‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7rApA2z71h ‚Äî matthew sigel, recovering CFA (@matthew_sigel) January 13, 2025 These projections are based on the performance of Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, with Bitcoin ETFs currently holding around $108 billion in assets, representing about 6% of its market cap. Can We Expect XRP & SOL ETF Approval Soon? Despite the excitement surrounding XRP and Solana ETFs, regulatory hurdles could delay their approval. However, JPMorgan remains hopeful that these ETFs will be greenlit in 2025 , especially with the crypto-friendly stance of President-elect Donald Trump and the nomination of Paul Atkins for SEC chair. With such political backing, many analysts believe that approval may be closer than expected. Impact on XRP‚Äôs Price According to JPMorgan‚Äôs predictions, the success of XRP ETFs could result in significant price growth, with estimates suggesting a 30% increase by the end of January. If these ETFs bring in billions, XRP‚Äôs market cap could surge, potentially setting the stage for even higher gains targeting around $3.82

title: Ripple‚Äôs XRP flips BlackRock by market cap
body: Ripple‚Äôs XRP has won over crypto and is now taking over traditional finance firms. According to on-chain data, XRP has overtaken BlackRock, the world‚Äôs largest asset manager, in market capitalization. As of January 15, 2025, XRP‚Äôs market cap sits at $162 billion, surpassing BlackRock‚Äôs $154 billion. This market milestone also places it ahead of globally recognized brands like Coca-Cola, Disney, and Nike. Crypto coins have set off on a Trump rally ahead of his inauguration on January 20, 2025. Ripple‚Äôs market cap now appears to be a beneficiary of the surge in price. On-chain data shows the coin has hit $2.8 for the first time since December 17, 2024. In the last 24 hours, XRP has recorded a 9% spike, while its weekly and monthly growth sits at 21.54% and 18.67%, respectively. A comparison of the market capitalization of Ripple‚Äôs XRP and BlackRock. Source: X XRP‚Äôs price has risen from a low of around $2 to nearly $2.9 in the past two weeks. The asset‚Äôs market cap has also increased to approximately $31.6 billion. XRP market activity surges and the outlook turns bullish Data shared by Santiment, an on-chain analytical platform, shows significant accumulation activity. Presently, wallets holding 1M to 10M XRP have increased their holdings by over 37% in the past two months. This represents an addition of approximately $3.8 billion in XRP since their accumulation began on November 12, 2024. üê≥üìà XRP investors are pleased to see the #3 market cap asset reach $2.69 today for the first time since December 17, 2024. This is being supported by continued enormous accumulation from wallets holding 1M-10M XRP, who own over 37% more coins than they did 2 months ago‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/G3a3N5iSAS ‚Äî Santiment (@santimentfeed) January 14, 2025 XRP‚Äôs market behavior shows a bullish structure on lower timeframes, characterized by higher highs and low lows. In addition, strong buying activity near the 0.5-0.618 Fibonacci retracement levels has contributed to its recent upward price spikes. However, despite the steady Trump rally, the coin sees poor trading levels between $2 and $3. Now, analysts are emphasizing the need for a breakout to confirm a new trend. Trading data of XRP/USDT. Source: TradingView A price move toward $3 could further validate a continuation of the bullish trend traders have seen since November. Without such a breakout, analysts expect a consolidation within the current range to remain at a standstill. Crypto analyst Bobby A noted on X that XRP.D, which measures Ripple‚Äôs market cap dominance, is targeting approximately 14% dominance. This is at its 4.236 Fibonacci extension. According to the trading chart analyst, with the overall crypto market capitalization currently at $3.3 trillion, gaining 14% dominance would increase XRP‚Äôs worth above $7.80. BlackRock maintains a bullish crypto stance Robbie Mitchnick, head of digital assets at BlackRock, recently shared the asset management company‚Äôs insights into the evolving role of cryptocurrencies. Speaking to Bloomberg, Mitchnick described Bitcoin as a scarce, global, and decentralized non-sovereign asset, free from specific country risks or traditional counterparty concerns. Looks like Satoshi Nakamoto achieved the goal he had 16 years ago. Mitchnick also spoke about the crypto‚Äôs market adoption. He asserts that the relationship between institutional investors and BTC is still in its early stages. Mitchnick also called the performance of BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT spot Bitcoin ETF in 2024 impressive. He believes more institutions and wealth advisors will be looking to bring in more inflows this year. However, Mitchnick emphasized that BlackRock does not want to be compared with MicroStrategy when it comes to Bitcoin investments. Unlike MicroStrategy , which is known for its aggressive, leverage-based Bitcoin accumulation strategy, BlackRock is leaning towards a more conservative and investor-focused approach. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not buying and selling Bitcoin for ourselves. This is for our investors,‚Äù reiterated Mitchnick, ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt need a three-times levered Bitcoin ETF. The asset‚Äôs got enough volatility without it.‚Äù From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan

title: Shanghai taps Taylor Swift to grow China‚Äôs economy
body: The entertainment industry is stepping up for China‚Äôs economy in a week that has been dominated by conversations about TikTok and potential alternative apps and investments. The focus has shifted to the American music icon, Taylor Swift. Shanghai has begun preliminary conversations with the singer and songwriter about organizing a concert this year. The agenda by Chinese cities aims to attract international celebrities and stimulate the economy. According to reports, Zhang Qi, the deputy director of Shanghai‚Äôs culture and tourism bureau, stated that local officials had hosted Swift‚Äôs team for preliminary discussions in the municipality. In a statement, he said, ‚ÄúAs for whether it will ultimately happen, it depends on the market and the attractiveness of our city. However, we are optimistic and think that there may be hope for this year.‚Äù The report was released one month after Swift ended her Eras Tour. The tour set a new record, with the final performance in Vancouver, Canada. The estimated global economic impact was within the remarkable range of $13 to $28 billion, with 10.1 million fans attending 149 events. Now, the second-largest economy in the world is set to step up and allow entertainment to work for it. It will follow in the footsteps of the United States, which has made the most of its entertainment industry. The demand for international performances in China In recent years, Shanghai has become a thriving center for cultural events. The city has hosted several large-scale commercial performances. To that end, there has also been a significant increase in the demand for live performances. The capital is frequently the initial destination for international celebrities during their mainland China tours. Apparently, Japan and Singapore were the sole Asian destinations on Swift‚Äôs record-setting Eras Tour. The concert documentary Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour , which was released globally in October 2024, was the highest-grossing music documentary in Chinese Box Office history. The movie screened in China for 69 days, attracting over 2 million viewers and grossing 100 million yuan ($13.8 million). Most followed international singers in China biggest music platforms (QQ, KuGou, NetEase) #1. Taylor Swift (25M) #2. BIGBANG (20M) #3. Justin Bieber (18M) #4. Blackpink (16M) #5. G-Dragon (12M) #6. EXO (11M) pic.twitter.com/nqgQIpwmsJ ‚Äî KLIFE (@8KLIFE) December 9, 2024 Additionally, local officials are placing their expectations on live music performances to stimulate their economies. This is prompting other Chinese cities to compete for the opportunity to host renowned singers. Tourism and consumer spending are driven by the willingness of many fans, particularly the youth, to travel to other cities for major concerts. For instance, last month, a tourism official in Hangzhou, China, expressed anticipation that Swift would perform in his country. This happened after British artist Ed Sheeran confirmed his intentions to play six gigs in Hangzhou in February and March, the only Chinese stop on his next tour. Also, this year, the southern island province of Hainan has extended an invitation to rap superstars such as Travis Scott and Cardi B to perform. Notably, two sold-out Kanye West concerts in Hainan in September generated an estimated 700 million yuan ($95.5 million) in tourism revenue. Other Western megastars who have visited China lately include American singer Mariah Carey, who played two gigs in Beijing in September. In October, John Legend performed in Beijing and Shanghai, while in December, British artists Jessie J and James Blunt performed in several locations around China. China‚Äôs government to loosen regulations on international acts The process of hosting international performances in China is complicated and requires the ability to navigate a complex web of regulations and restrictions. In the past, the Chinese government has been hesitant to allow big events. Most especially ones with foreign singers, out of fears that they would change Chinese culture and threaten public safety. However, advisers to the Shanghai government referred to celebrities like Swift as ‚Äúwalking GDP‚Äù due to their tremendous economic influence. They advocated for lesser limitations on international performers in order to stage more high-profile shows. As a result, the Shanghai municipal government‚Äôs counselors‚Äô office posted on its social media account that government departments should simplify the process of obtaining visas, approvals, and customs in order to attract top-tier talent. title: What‚Äôs ahead for 2025: Kraken‚Äôs CF Benchmarks forecasts the year to come
body: Note: This is a blog summary of CF Benchmarks‚Äô full 2025 market outlook . Digital asset evolution Cryptocurrencies are no longer a niche interest. Bitcoin and Ethereum have seen their ecosystems expand significantly. One of the biggest drivers has been the introduction of ETFs for each token. These financial products have accelerated institutional investment and brought in many individual investors that are more comfortable buying coin exposure using a vehicle they‚Äôre already familiar with, creating a bridge between traditional finance and the crypto world. Ethereum, often called the backbone of decentralized finance (DeFi) , has seen rapid improvements. Layer 2 solutions like Optimism are making transactions faster and cheaper, enabling more widespread adoption of decentralized applications (dApps) , NFTs and digital identity tools. As regulatory frameworks solidify, digital assets are gaining greater legitimacy, setting the stage for even broader integration into mainstream finance. The global economic landscape Economic conditions in 2025 are marked by cautious optimism. In the U.S., a combination of tax reforms and regulatory adjustments under new leadership has fueled renewed confidence in business investment. However, inflation remains a pressing concern. Although it‚Äôs trending downward, sticky costs in areas like housing and services continue to challenge policymakers. Globally, challenges abound. China is grappling with a prolonged property sector slump, while Europe faces political uncertainty and slowing economic growth. In contrast, India is emerging as a bright spot, balancing tight monetary policies with robust structural growth. Together, these dynamics suggest a mixed but resilient global economy where targeted opportunities could yield substantial returns. Stablecoins and the rise of digital dollars Stablecoins , digital currencies tied to real-world assets like the U.S. dollar, are experiencing a surge in adoption. They‚Äôre being used for everything from international remittances to enterprise transactions, offering speed and cost advantages over traditional banking systems. The U.S. regulatory environment is evolving to provide clearer guidelines for stablecoin issuers, which is expected to boost institutional confidence. By the end of 2025, the stablecoin market could surpass $300 billion in value , reflecting its growing role in global commerce and digital payments. Ethereum‚Äôs Layer 2 networks and competitors like Solana are likely to play a key role in facilitating this growth, offering the infrastructure needed for high-volume transactions. Tokenization as the future of investments Tokenization ‚Äî the process of turning real-world assets into blockchain-based digital tokens ‚Äî is poised to reshape the investment landscape. In 2024, tokenized assets reached $13.6 billion, and that figure is expected to exceed $30 billion in 2025 . On-chain money market funds are leading the way, attracting investors with promises of transparency and efficiency. For instance, new stablecoins like Ethena ‚Äôs USDtb, backed by major financial institutions, are fueling interest in tokenized financial products. While tokenization still faces hurdles like infrastructure development and regulatory approval, its potential to democratize finance and enhance liquidity is undeniable. AI and blockchain: A synergistic future The integration of artificial intelligence (AI) with blockchain technology is one of the most exciting trends for 2025. AI agents ‚Äî autonomous programs capable of managing digital assets and executing smart contracts ‚Äî are becoming more prevalent in blockchain ecosystems. By the end of the year, AI-driven activity is projected to account for over 10% of all blockchain transactions. These agents thrive in decentralized networks, where their ability to operate without human intervention creates new efficiencies. For example, AI could optimize liquidity in decentralized finance or enhance the security of digital identity systems. With venture capital pouring into this space, several startups focused on AI-blockchain convergence are expected to reach unicorn status. The bigger picture: Challenges and opportunities While 2025 promises innovation and growth, challenges remain. The interplay between monetary policy, economic resilience, and technological adoption will define the year. Central banks must navigate inflationary pressures while supporting growth, and businesses will need to adapt to new regulatory landscapes. On the other hand, the opportunities are vast. From the continued rise of digital assets to breakthroughs in AI and blockchain, the coming year offers a glimpse into the future of finance and technology. For investors and innovators alike, 2025 is shaping up to be a pivotal year. You‚Äôve read the summary, now get the full picture Enjoy this summary? Dive deeper with CF Benchmarks‚Äô full 2025 market outlook, 21 PDF pages of charts, graphs and in-depth crypto insight from the world‚Äôs first and leading digital asset index provider . title: Dogwifhat Las Vegas sphere project faces scrutiny as influencers in charge still hold $700k in donations
body: Traders online are scrutinizing the fundraising project done to raise $650,000 to put the dogwifhat icon on the Las Vegas Sphere due to inactivity. The funds have surpassed the goal, however the dog with the pink hat has yet to appear on the sphere. On the social media platform X, users have started noticing the project‚Äôs inactivity 10 months after the funds surpassed the set goal. Meanwhile, the donations worth nearly $700,000 in USD Coin ( USDC ) are still kept frozen in the crypto wallet held by a team of influencers. One of the users on X with the username @0xShual noted how ‚Äúbizarre‚Äù it was that no one has spoken out about the project‚Äôs lack of accomplishment after almost a year of fundraising. At the time of writing, the dogwifhat ( WIF ) icon, which features a Shiba Inu dog wearing a pink hat, has yet to appear on the Las Vegas Sphere. ‚ÄúJokes aside ‚Äî what the fuck? do people not care about this? no petition for refunds, nothing? At least farm with this capital, it‚Äôs just been sitting there idly for almost a year,‚Äù said Shual in a recent X post . Many users began expressing doubt in the comments section on whether the project will actually become a reality. ‚ÄúYeah definitely odd, also Ansem basically saying like ‚Äúit was hard so I stopped trying‚Äù made me lol (laugh out loud),‚Äù said another user. The Las Vegas Sphere is a 366 feet high and 516 feet wide globe that spans Sands Avenue, just off the Las Vegas Strip and east of the Venetian resort. It is known to project various different emojis and advertisements on what the site claims to be ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs largest LED screen.‚Äù You might also like: Dogwifhat‚Äôs X account hacked to promote meme coins: report In January 2024, a group of five crypto influencers led by Zion Thomas, known in crypto spaces under the alias Ansem, launched a campaign to raise money to put the dogwifhat icon on the Las Vegas Sphere. By March 2024, the group managed to raise enough money to pay the $650,000 fee needed to put the Solana meme coin icon on the Sphere for an entire week. However, weeks after the campaign surpassed its target, updates began to slow down and donors began to doubt the project‚Äôs validity. The last update given by Ansem was in July 2024, when he seemingly joked about the campaign failing to put dogwifhat on the sphere due to a blue-screen error. ‚ÄúDamn i can‚Äôt believe this happened on the day we put wif on the sphere,‚Äù he wrote in his post . damn i can't believe this happened on the day we put wif on the sphere üòî pic.twitter.com/UoDDSQ37J4 ‚Äî Ansem üêÇüÄÑÔ∏è (@blknoiz06) July 19, 2024 Whether the group intends to carry out the project is still unknown, but traders have begun to grow nervous as the dogwifhat coin dips by nearly 45% in the past month, according to data from crypto.news. In the past week, the meme coin has gone down by more than 18%. Launched in November 2023 on the Solana ( SOL ) blockchain, dogwifhat is a meme coin based on a viral internet picture of a dog wearing a pink crocheted hat. It gained popularity among traders, reaching a $1 billion market cap only 81 days after launch. Now, the meme coin‚Äôs market cap sits at around $1.5 billion. title: World Liberty Financial Moves $61.4M in Ether Amid Treasury Strategy
body: The cryptocurrency landscape is abuzz with developments as two high-profile projects with ties to prominent figures make significant moves. World Liberty Financial, a crypto initiative backed by President-elect Donald Trump, has transferred over $61 million worth of Ether in the past day, raising questions about its treasury management practices. Meanwhile, The Open Network (TON), a blockchain project historically linked to Telegram, has announced plans to expand its presence in the United States under Trump‚Äôs incoming administration, with a focus on driving retail adoption of digital assets. World Liberty Financial Moves $61.4 Million in Ether Amid Speculation About Treasury Management World Liberty Financial (WLFI), the crypto project backed by President-elect Donald Trump , has made headlines once again with significant on-chain activity. Recently, the project transferred $61.4 million worth of Ether (ETH), as reported by blockchain analytics platform Arkham Intelligence . The movement has sparked curiosity and speculation among market participants and observers. Arkham Intelligence data reveals that WLFI‚Äôs primary wallet executed multiple transactions, dispersing funds into several wallets, including Coinbase Prime‚Äîa service known for catering to institutional clients. At its peak in mid-December, the wallet held approximately $83 million, but as of now, it contains only $16.7 million. The project‚Äôs official account on X addressed the movements in an effort to quell speculation. In a statement, WLFI clarified, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre making routine movements of our crypto holdings as part of regular treasury management, payment of fees and expenses, and to address working capital requirements. To be clear, we are not selling tokens ‚Äî we are simply reallocating assets for ordinary business purposes.‚Äù The message emphasized that these transfers are part of efforts to maintain a ‚Äústrong, secure, and efficient treasury,‚Äù dismissing any claims of potential token sales or financial distress. However, the sizable transfers and the timing of the transactions have drawn mixed reactions from the crypto community. Large-scale transactions by high-profile crypto projects often lead to market speculation. In WLFI's case, some have raised concerns about liquidity pressures or operational challenges. Others believe the project is executing routine financial practices as stated, ensuring liquidity for operations and fee payments. The latest transactions come shortly after WLFI announced its appointment of Tron Founder Justin Sun as an advisor. The move followed a $30 million investment in WLFI by HTX, the crypto exchange formerly known as Huobi and closely tied to Sun. Sun‚Äôs involvement adds another layer of intrigue to WLFI‚Äôs operations. Known for his aggressive business strategies and significant influence in the crypto space, Sun's advisory role has been viewed as a strategic move to strengthen WLFI‚Äôs global positioning. WLFI‚Äôs Strategic Roadmap Launched as a fork of Aave, WLFI aims to leverage the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem for greater accessibility and financial inclusivity. Backed by a coalition of Trump‚Äôs friends and family, the project has captured public attention due to its high-profile endorsements and ambitious goals. However, its association with Trump and recent developments have also invited scrutiny. WLFI‚Äôs emphasis on maintaining transparency about its financial operations are part of its efforts to build trust within the volatile crypto sector. Despite this, unanswered questions about the project's long-term strategy and financial health persist. With the project‚Äôs Ether holdings now significantly reduced, analysts and investors will closely monitor WLFI's next steps. Will this reallocation lead to new partnerships, product launches, or a more robust ecosystem? Or will the speculation around its finances overshadow its innovation efforts? As the project navigates these waters, one thing is clear: WLFI‚Äôs movements will remain under a magnifying glass, especially with Donald Trump‚Äôs presidency looming large on the horizon. For now, the crypto community will be watching closely to see how WLFI balances its ambitious goals with the operational realities of a high-profile DeFi project. The Open Network (TON) Eyes US Expansion Under Incoming Trump Administration The Open Network (TON), a blockchain project with historic ties to Telegram, is setting its sights on expanding into the United States. Under the administration of President-elect Donald Trump, the TON Foundation has identified the US as a key market for its growth strategy, signaling a major development in the project‚Äôs journey. The TON Foundation confirmed its focus on US expansion on Jan. 14, with newly appointed president Manuel Stotz leading the initiative. This marks a pivotal step for TON as it positions itself to play a significant role in the evolving US crypto landscape. Manuel Stotz, a prominent digital asset investor and the founder of Kingsway Capital Partners, will assume the presidency of the TON Foundation, replacing Steve Yun, who will remain a board member. Stotz emphasized the importance of the US market in a statement, stating, ‚ÄúThe US ranks as one of the world‚Äôs largest financial centers, and we see enormous potential for it to develop into a crypto hub that will promote and support the retail adoption of digital assets.‚Äù Stotz‚Äôs vision aligns with TON‚Äôs goal of fostering widespread adoption of blockchain technology and digital assets. A seasoned investor, Stotz has backed more than 50 industry projects, including high-profile names like Animoca Brands, Blockchain.com, and Toncoin. TON‚Äôs ambitions in the US are not without precedent. Initially launched as the ‚ÄùTelegram Open Network‚Äù by Telegram co-founders Pavel and Nikolai Durov in 2018, the project aimed to revolutionize blockchain technology. However, legal challenges from the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) forced Telegram to abandon the project in 2020. The SEC alleged that TON‚Äôs $1.7 billion token sale for its Gram cryptocurrency constituted an unregistered securities offering. Following the legal battle, Telegram formally distanced itself from the project, shutting down the TON testnet and terminating its direct involvement. However, the open-source nature of the project allowed independent developers and communities to take the reins, leading to the establishment of the TON Foundation in Switzerland in 2023. As a nonprofit organization funded entirely by community contributions, the TON Foundation has worked to reinvigorate the project. Despite Telegram‚Äôs formal exit, the blockchain and its cryptocurrency, Toncoin, have become increasingly integrated into Telegram‚Äôs ecosystem. Telegram CEO Pavel Durov has remained a vocal supporter of TON, and the platform now features various TON-related functionalities, including support for third-party wallets. Stotz‚Äôs appointment and the US expansion mark a turning point in the TON Foundation‚Äôs efforts to build on this legacy. In a blog post , Stotz expressed his commitment to driving TON‚Äôs mission forward, stating, ‚ÄúI look forward to working with our partners and stakeholders to accelerate this mission ‚Äî especially in the dynamic and innovative US market.‚Äù The US as a Crypto Hub TON‚Äôs focus on the US aligns with broader trends in the global blockchain space. The United States, as one of the world‚Äôs largest financial markets, is a critical battleground for projects seeking mainstream adoption. However, navigating the complex regulatory environment remains a significant challenge for blockchain initiatives. The Trump administration‚Äôs stance on cryptocurrency and blockchain could play a crucial role in shaping TON‚Äôs success in the US. While the administration‚Äôs policies are not yet clear, the project‚Äôs leadership appears optimistic about the opportunities ahead. TON‚Äôs renewed push into the US market signals its commitment to becoming a major player in the blockchain ecosystem. With a history marked by legal hurdles and a resilient community of developers, TON‚Äôs journey is a testament to the decentralized nature of blockchain innovation. As the US prepares for a new administration, the TON Foundation‚Äôs efforts could help redefine the role of blockchain in the country‚Äôs financial system. For now, all eyes are on Manuel Stotz and the TON Foundation as they navigate this pivotal chapter in the project‚Äôs history.

title: Hedera Hashgraph price could soar as HBAR forms a bullish pattern
body: Hedera Hashgraph price has stabilized, and a unique chart pattern on the daily chart suggests a potential rebound. Hedera Hashgraph ( HBAR ) has risen for two consecutive days, reaching a high of $0.3140, its highest level since January 7. The token remains about 600% above its lowest level in 2024, with a market cap of over $11.3 billion. HBAR‚Äôs recent performance is driven by investor anticipation of a spot exchange-traded fund approval by the Securities and Exchange Commission. Canary, an emerging fund manager, has filed for an HBAR-focused ETF , and some analysts believe it has a strong chance of being approved. In a report on Tuesday, JPMorgan predicted that the SEC, now led by Paul Atkins, is likely to approve crypto funds. The report cited Ripple ( XRP ) and Solana ( SOL ) as examples of assets that could attract billions of dollars in inflows. The approval of these funds could pave the way for a spot Hedera ETF. You might also like: Bank of Namibia grants provisional licenses to two crypto exchanges Meanwhile, the total value locked in Hedera Hashgraph‚Äôs ecosystem has continued to rise in US dollar terms. The network currently holds nearly $180 million in assets, led by protocols such as Stader, SaucerSwap, Bonzo Finance, and Heliswap. Its stablecoin market cap has increased to $11 million. Hedera is often seen as a faster and more cost-effective alternative to Ethereum ( ETH ). The network‚Äôs governance council includes major companies such as Tata, Abrdn, Worldpay, IBM, and Dell. Hedera Hashgraph price could surge soon HBAR price chart | Source: crypto.news The daily chart shows that HBAR has remained in a tight range after peaking at $0.3922 in November. The token has formed a symmetrical triangle pattern, a key part of the bullish pennant pattern, which is a popular continuation signal. HBAR is trading above its 50-day Exponential Moving Average and has reached the ultimate resistance level of the Murrey Math Lines. It is also positioned between the 61.8% and 78.6% Fibonacci retracement levels, indicating a consolidation phase. The chart suggests that HBAR is likely to experience a strong bullish breakout. The next key level to watch is $0.3920, the token‚Äôs high on December 3. A move above that level could trigger further gains, with the psychological target set at $0.50, representing a 68% increase from the current price. You might also like: Hedera hits 3-year high, monthly gains near 600%

title: U.S CPI Data Released: Inflation Rate Rises To 2.9%, Crypto Market Turns Bullish
body: The post U.S CPI Data Released: Inflation Rate Rises To 2.9%, Crypto Market Turns Bullish appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The US Consumer Price Index (CPI) report for December, a key measure of inflation, was just released today by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS). While the CPI release could strengthen the US dollar, it is unlikely to lead to immediate changes in the Federal Reserve‚Äôs monetary policy. The US inflation data arrived in line with expectations. The Year-over-Year (YoY) CPI came at 2.9% as expected, up from 2.7% and the core CPI came in at 3.2%, slightly below the 3.3% estimate. The inflation was expected to rise by 2.9% annually in December, up from 2.7% in November. Core CPI inflation was forecasted to remain steady at 3.3%. The forecasts suggest a 0.3% increase for the headline CPI and a 0.2% rise for core CPI. Crypto Market Reaction The Crypto market is rallying as the US December Core CPI rises 0.2% MoM, below the expected 0.3%. Notably, BTC price skyrocketed by $1K in reaction to the news. XRP is currently trading at $2.85, up over 10% in the past day. ETH, SOL, DOGE, ADA are trading up by 1.80%, 3.03%, 4.56% and 7.90% respectively. FOMC Meeting Besides, the FOMC Minutes from the December meeting revealed concerns among Fed officials about rising inflation risks. They also noted that changes in trade and immigration policies could make it harder to control inflation, highlighting their potential impact on the US economy. However, 10x Research head Markus Thielen expects movement before the January 29 FOMC meeting. ‚ÄúBitcoin trades within a narrowing triangle, signaling a breakout is imminent ‚Äî likely no later than the January 29 FOMC meeting,‚Äù he noted on January 14. Thielen suggests that lower inflation might spark a Bitcoin price surge. ‚ÄúFrom a trading perspective, the best approach is to follow the breakout, regardless of direction,‚Äù he remarked. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : SEC Chair Gensler Admits to Never Owning Crypto Ahead of Resignation and Ripple Deadline , Implications Of Inflation Data and Fed Policy The incoming Trump administration is expected to adopt stricter immigration policies, a looser fiscal approach, and reintroduce tariffs on imports from China and Europe, which could all push the inflation higher. As a result, markets now anticipate that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by just 25 basis points this year, keeping the outlook for the US Dollar stable. However, with a slow cooling of the labor market and high inflation, the December inflation report is unlikely to lead to major changes in the Fed‚Äôs policy, with a 97% chance of no rate change as per CME Group‚Äôs FedWatch Tool, at the January 29 meeting. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World! title: SEC Chair Gensler Admits to Never Owning Crypto Ahead of Resignation and Ripple Deadline
body: The post SEC Chair Gensler Admits to Never Owning Crypto Ahead of Resignation and Ripple Deadline appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Four business days before his resignation on Inauguration Day, SEC Chair gary gensler gary gensler Gary Gensler is a pioneer and the current chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. He has extensive experience that spans Wall Street, government regulation, and an angel teaching about cryptocurrencies and blockchain at MIT. Gary S. Gensler was on born October 18, 1957, in Baltimore, Maryland.He graduated from Pikesville High School in 1975, where he was later given a Distinguished Alumnus award. He also earned a degree in economics.Gensler served in the United States Department of the Treasury as Assistant Secretary for Financial Markets from 1997 to 1999, then as Undersecretary for Domestic Finance from 1999 to 2001He has expressed his desire to present crypto-related approach changes later on that include token commitments, decentralized finance, stablecoins, guardianship, exchange-traded resources, and advancing stages. Chairman in an interview with CNBC , shared his thoughts on his time at the agency and his stance on the cryptocurrency market . Regarding Bitcoin, Gensler stressed that the SEC has never classified it as a security. He described Bitcoin as a highly speculative and volatile asset but noted its global appeal, comparing it to gold in terms of its long-standing value and widespread interest. He also suggested that, like gold, Bitcoin might continue to play a role in the future of global markets, though other assets could emerge as alternatives. The SEC‚Äôs Role in Cryptocurrency: Enforcing Laws and Protecting Investors Gensler pointed out that for the many other cryptocurrency projects in existence, they must demonstrate clear use cases and strong fundamentals to remain viable in the long term. Without these, he warned, they are unlikely to succeed. The SEC chair also clarified that he has never owned any cryptocurrencies and has consistently maintained this stance for the past seven or eight years. His predecessor, Jay Clayton, who is set to return in the Trump Administration, brought about 80 cases to protect investors. Gensler said that the SEC‚Äôs role is to enforce laws, ensuring transparency and protecting against fraud and manipulation. Unfortunately, he said that there has been a lot of this in the crypto space, especially with crypto exchanges that not only acted as platforms but also traded against their own customers. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Ripple vs SEC: Gensler Set to File Opening Brief, Can New SEC Chair Override It? , Paul Atkins to Replace Gensler: Shifting Toward a Pro-Crypto Approach Paul Atkins is set to replace Gensler . Atkins has been vocal about the need for a clear regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology . title: Unexpected Decline in Core CPI Sends Bitcoin Price Higher
body: While headline inflation came in faster than hoped in December, investors for the moment are in buy mode after an unexpected decline in the year-over-year core rate. The closely-watched Consumer Price Index (CPI) increased 0.4% in December, slightly higher than analyst consensus and the previous month's 0.3%. On a year-over-year basis, CPI was up 2.9%, compared to analyst forecasts for 2.9% and previous month's reading at 2.7%. Core CPI, which excludes food and energy costs, rose 0.2% in December, versus expectations for 0.2% and the previous month's 0.3% figure. Core CPI year-over-year, however, dipped to 3.2% against forecasts for 3.3% and the November rate of 3.3%. The core pace of inflation is of considerable import to policymakers, who have expressed at least a modest bit of frustration over its stickiness above 3% as headline inflation fell at a far quicker pace. The price of bitcoin ( BTC ) rose about $1,500 in the minutes following the report to $98,500 following the report, up 2% over the past 24 hours, CoinDesk data shows. In traditional markets, U.S. stock index futures added about 0.5% after the data, while bond yields and the dollar both sharply declined. Crypto markets have traded rangebound through January at the whims of macroeconomic data and monetary policy expectations amidst a strong economy and concerns of sticky inflation. Bitcoin consolidated mostly below $100,000 since Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's hawkish comments in December. That, along with a string of stronger-than-forecast economic and inflation data, led market participants to nearly erase all expectations for rate cuts this year. Most recently, Tuesday's Producer Price Index (PPI) for December showed cooler than expected inflation readings, supporting BTC's rebound to $97,000 following the abrupt sell-off below $90,000 earlier in the week.

title: Bitcoin Price Shoots Up Above $98.5K Following Release of US December CPI Data
body: The United States Labor Department announced the highly-anticipated CPI and Core CPI data for December, which actually matched the overall expectations. The prices of riskier assets like cryptocurrency headed straight north despite the fears of higher inflation and no interest cuts by the US Federal Reserve this year. U.S. CPI: +2.9% YEAR-OVER-YEAR (EST. +2.9%) U.S. CORE CPI: +3.2% YEAR-OVER-YEAR (EST. +3.3%) ‚Äî *Walter Bloomberg (@DeItaone) January 15, 2025 As the post above demonstrates, the Consumer Price Index for December matched the 2.9% increase, which was the overall expectation. The Core CPI, which excludes more volatile sectors like food and energy, is slightly under the estimations at 3.2%. Although the increase for December was the largest in eight months and slightly bigger than that for November, cryptocurrency prices reacted with immediate gains. BTC stood at just shy of $97,000 in preparation for the CPI numbers but shot up immediately to over $98,500 after the news broke out. This is the asset‚Äôs highest price tag in just over a week. Moreover, BTC is up by nearly ten grand since its bottom on Monday at $89,200. Perhaps the markets reacted prematurely to the upcoming inflation data, and investors acted ahead of the actual news. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView The post Bitcoin Price Shoots Up Above $98.5K Following Release of US December CPI Data appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Despite XLM, DOGE, ADA rebounding, investors are drawn to this crypto
body: Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only. As Stellar, Dogecoin, and Cardano rise, Rollblock is emerging as the next big crypto presale in 2025. Table of Contents Rollblock: The altcoin redefining blockchain gaming Stellar: Building momentum amid challenges Dogecoin: Popular but limited in utility Cardano: Bullish signs but long-term uncertainty Conclusion As established names like Stellar (XLM), Dogecoin (DOGE), and Cardano (ADA) capture market attention with their recent gains, a new crypto presale project, Rollblock (RBLK) is what savvy investors talk about. RBLK could be the new leader in the blockchain gaming sector. Rollblock: The altcoin redefining blockchain gaming Rollblock is making waves with its presale, having already raised over $8.6 million. The platform supports over 7,000 games, live casinos, and sports betting. It targets the $500 billion global gaming market. What sets this altcoin apart is its integration of Ethereum-backed smart contracts, ensuring transparency and security in all transactions. Rollblock‚Äôs deflationary tokenomics provide additional appeal. Regular token burns, buybacks, and staking rewards create scarcity while incentivizing long-term holding. Unlike many speculative projects, Rollblock offers real-world utility by merging gaming with decentralized finance (DeFi). This combination not only addresses market demands but also positions Rollblock as a frontrunner in the next wave of crypto innovation. Tokens are priced at only $0.045 in its presale, so Rollblock represents an opportunity for early investors to secure significant returns. Rollblock‚Äôs model and growing ecosystem could make it one of the most profitable investments in 2025. Stellar: Building momentum amid challenges The Stellar price went up from 7.43% to $0.4356 and trading volume also reflected some new interest in this altcoin as it surged by 40%. If Stellar breaks resistance at $0.4400, it could rally to $0.4600. But, the Stellar ecosystem shows signs of stagnation. With just $53 million in total value locked within its DeFi sector, Stellar lags behind competitors offering more extensive networks and applications. While Stellar benefits from bullish sentiment, its long-term growth depends on revitalizing its ecosystem to attract sustained investor interest. Dogecoin: Popular but limited in utility Dogecoin continues to thrive on its strong community and high-profile endorsements. Recent whale activity saw 690 million DOGE moved in 48 hours, with 470 million DOGE added to wallets following a price dip. DOGE now trades around $0.33189, and optimism remains high, as evidenced by 81% of Binance traders holding long positions. Although DOGE is very popular, its reliance on speculative sentiment clouds its prospects as a long-term investment. The DOGE price could reach an ATH again, but this is never guaranteed. It can fall just as fast as it goes up. Cardano: Bullish signs but long-term uncertainty Cardano is showing signs of a breakout, with whales accumulating 90 million ADA worth $84.5 million in just four days. Currently trading around $0.93, ADA is expected to test resistance at $1.10, with analysts predicting a potential rally to $1.50. However, macroeconomic pressures have weighed heavily on ADA, which recently fell 24% from its January high. The ADA roadmap looks promising, but everything is very long term and ROI won‚Äôt be as immediate as in a crypto presale. Conclusion While Stellar, Dogecoin, and Cardano offer varying degrees of potential, Rollblock‚Äôs unique approach to blockchain gaming and DeFi integration makes it the most compelling option. title: The Top Four Meme Coins Making Waves in January 2025
body: In another positive step for crypto ‚Äì from Bitcoin to meme coins ‚Äì the US House Subcommittee on Digital Assets, Financial Technology and Artificial Intelligence has a new Vice Chairman, and it‚Äôs none other than Congressman Tom Emmer. Emmer is known for his pro-crypto stance, making it even more likely that drive for digital assets regulation and innovation will be amped up following President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs January 20 inauguration. As Emmer himself expressed in a post on X , ‚ÄòWith President Trump in the White House, and Gary Gensler confined to the waste bin of Washington, we have an excellent opportunity to ensure that the future of digital assets is guided by Americans, with American values.‚Äô Rather scathing words thrown in Gensler‚Äôs direction there. However, as Chair of the US Securities and Exchange Commission, Gensler is decidedly anti-crypto. If crypto were Batman, Gensler would be The Joker. Gensler will step down from his position on January 20. Emmer‚Äôs appointment was announced by House Financial Services Committee Chairman French Hill, who added that ‚ÄòTogether, our Committee will work to craft a regulatory framework that maintains America as a leader in innovation.‚Äô It‚Äôs a statement that will warm the heart of the crypto market, which is no doubt feeling fragile after watching the Bitcoin ($BTC) price being left battered and bruised. Despite hitting the $100K milestone in December, $BTC saw a sustained decline , with a particularly low point on January 13, when it briefly dipped below the $90K mark. Today, the $BTC price stands at around $97K. Is it Really All Doom and Gloom For Bitcoin? Bitcoin is no stranger to volatility. And while the new year has yet to be kind to the $BTC price, there‚Äôs still cause for cautious optimism. ‚ÄòBitcoin‚Äôs historic rally, accelerating corporate and state adoption, and the onset of altcoin season signal a broader crypto bull market with BTC potentially reaching $180k by 2025,‚Äô say VanEck analysts. CNBC analyst Tom Lee is even more bullish , suggesting that Bitcoin could reach as much as $250K during the course of this year. Of course, when Bitcoin does well, the rest of the market tends to follow suit , and that includes meme coins . Here are the meme coins that have been making waves in January, with no signs of slowing down anytime soon. 1. Wall Street Pepe ($WEPE) ‚Äì A Record-Setting Presale Makes For an Exciting Year Ahead Last year, we watched Pepe Unchained‚Äôs ($PEPU) presale hit unprecedented highs. But now, in a ‚ÄòHold my beer‚Äô moment, the Wall Street Pepe ($WEPE) presale is making Pepe Unchained‚Äôs presale look like kindergarten for tadpoles. Since launching on December 3, the $WEPE token presale has already raised a phenomenal $48.5M. What‚Äôs behind the froggy feeding frenzy? Wall Street Pepe despises market manipulation by whales hiding in insider groups. So this Pepe the Frog in Wolf of Wall Street guise is forming a WEPE Army of retail traders, giving them exclusive trading insights and tips. And through those alpha calls, he‚Äôll teach his frog army recruits to ‚Äòtrade like Pepe‚Äô and turn them into whales in their own rights. The WEPE Army is growing in leaps and bounds, and at this rate, the presale could end sooner than its original end-February closing date. Enlisting is a simple process as long as you have a crypto wallet like the Best Wallet app or MetaMask. But the clock is ticking if you‚Äôre considering buying $WEPE and joining the Frog Army at the current presale price of $0.000367. 2. Solaxy ($SOLX) ‚Äì The World‚Äôs First-Ever Solana Layer-2 Ecosystem Also currently on presale, the multichain Solaxy ($SOLX) meme token is building on the Solana blockchain to limit congestion issues and failed transactions. But, as they say in the classics, ‚ÄòThat‚Äôs not all.‚Äô Solaxy promises to unlock Solana‚Äôs full potential by adding scalability and more speed. This alone is pretty exciting, but Solaxy will also be on Ethereum, bridging the gap between its DeFi and asset tokenization ecosystem and the Solana blockchain. No wonder investors are sitting up and taking notice. Solaxy raised $350K within 24 hours of the presale launch on December 12 at a price of $0.001556 (with an APY of 5,039% APY). And as of today, the $SOLX kitty stands at nearly $10.5M. A price increase is imminent, but if you make haste, you can get your hands on 1 $SOLX for $0.0016, with $ETH, $USDT, $BNB, or a bank card as the payment options. 3. Fartcoin ($FARTCOIN) ‚Äì A Ridiculously Named Token You Should Take Very Seriously Schoolboy-humor name aside, Fartcoin ($FARTCOIN) is another one to watch. Is the token itself useless? Absolutely. Fartcoin lets users claim initial tokens by submitting fart jokes and memes. That‚Äôs in addition to its, ahem, ‚ÄòGas Fee‚Äô system. Each transaction produces the sound of a fart. Yet despite the odds, the Fartcoin price hit a personal best of $1.59 on January 3. Fartcoin is listed on CEXs with a not-too-shabby $977.59M market capitalization, holding fairly well in the current market environment. It soared 47% in the first week of January, hitting the $1B market cap milestone at the same time. The past week hasn‚Äôt been as kind to Fartcoin, but looking at the $FARTCOIN price over the last month, chances are 2025 is going to be a good year for this meme coin. 4. Pepe Unchained ($PEPU) ‚Äì The Meme Coin Dedicated Blockchain That‚Äôs Living up to Its Presale Hype Initially coined as the best-selling presale token of all time by Binance Square, Pepe Unchained ($PEPU) is currently being dethroned by its Pepe contemporary $WEPE. But since listing (after raising an impressive $74M), $PEPU has gone from strength to strength. Having listed on both DEXs and CEXs in December, this Layer-2 blockchain for meme coins puts speed, security, and low transaction fees at its core. In line with pretty much the entire crypto market, $PEPU hasn‚Äôt had much fun over the past week. But it‚Äôs keeping its froggy chin up ‚Äì as it should, based on its performance over the last month. Pepe Unchained‚Äôs market cap stands at $107.6M, and 1$PEPU currently costs $0.013327. It‚Äôs too soon to tell what the crypto market will do once Trump‚Äôs inauguration is done and dusted. But if analyst forecasts are on point, it could be a very good year for Pepe Unchained and the rest of these meme coins. However, before making any investment decisions, be sure to do your own research. After all, we‚Äôre not in the business of giving financial advice.

title: Best 4 Cryptos To Buy Now As Bitcoin Aims For $150K In Q1 2025
body: The post Best 4 Cryptos To Buy Now As Bitcoin Aims For $150K In Q1 2025 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The cryptocurrency market is buzzing with opportunities as Bitcoin sets its sights on $150,000 in Q1 2025. Some of the most popular crypto investments this year include Dogecoin (DOGE), XRP, Yeti Ouro (YETIO), and Rexas Finance (RXS). Projects based on advanced technologies and public interest are considered to be among the most promising investments in 2025. Dogecoin Price Prediction: A Memecoin Leader With Renewed Momentum The memecoin related to Tesla Technologies CEO Elon Musk, Dogecoin, has raised the anticipation of an upcoming bullish trend. DOGE price is currently sitting at $0.33 at the beginning of January 2025 and is positioning itself for another upswing due to whale activities. Data from on-chain analytics showed that major holders moved $74 million DOGE to Coinbase, igniting rumors of a price pump. In the short term, market volatility has not shaken Dogecoin, as the coin continues to trade above the crucial $0.30 level. Experts believe that if Bitcoin keeps rising, DOGE may reach new heights, and estimations point to a possible high of $0.50 in the next few months. This price movement could pave the way for Dogecoin price to get to $2 by the year 2025, making it the favorite of the meme coins. Source X XRP Price Prediction: A Major Player In Cross-Border Payments Ripple‚Äôs XRP is emerging as one of the top cryptocurrencies in the current crypto bull run. Following a mixed ruling against the SEC in 2024, Ripple‚Äôs token is selling at $2.40 . Its recent breakout past the $2.50 resistance level signals bullish momentum, with analysts targeting $4 or even $8 by the end of 2025 for XRP price. Source X The use of XRP in the transfer of cross-border payments remains attractive to both retail and institutional investors. The company‚Äôs collaboration with other financial institutions and the introduction of stablecoin (RLUSD) make Ripple even stronger in the market. This is because XRP has historically exhibited a very high correlation with the rest of the crypto market, and as the price of Bitcoin continues to rise, so too may the price of XRP. Yeti Ouro (YETIO): Combining Meme Culture With Real Utility Yeti Ouro has turned out to be one of the promising cryptocurrency projects of 2025, which combines meme factor with usefulness. In its current presale, 1 YETIO token costs $0.017, and more than 26% of the total supply has been sold so far. As of now, 26,068,100 tokens have been sold, a clear testimony of the investors‚Äô confidence in the project‚Äôs plan. Yeti Ouro is a play-to-earn (P2E) game developer, and at the center of its ecosystem is YetiGo, a game with graphics developed on Unreal Engine 5. The game provides fast and intense races in the elimination mode with high-quality graphics and delivers fun along with financial gains to the players. This attracts both the gaming and the crypto communities, and as a result, there is a high demand for the token. The team shared a video showcasing the first glance at the Level 1 map at a distance. This is a larger area of the map that uses the same death match style game play. Players have a large surface area to avoid attackers and collect power-ups to help them defeat opponents. There is so much detail yet to be shown, with garages for vehicle repairs and upgrades as well as hidden tunnels and harsh terrains to get through. Yeti Ouro has strong tokenomics to ensure long-term stability with provisions for community rewards, liquidity, and ecosystem development. Like other meme coins such as Dogecoin and Shiba Inu, YETIO has a unique distinction in that it has practical use. With its focus on the community, a play-to-earn mechanism, and DeFi elements, Yeti Ouro is more than a meme coin and is identified as a promising investment for 2025. Rexas Finance (RXS): Unlocking Real-World Asset Tokenization Rexas Finance (RXS) is revolutionizing decentralized finance (DeFi) by enabling real-world asset tokenization. This innovative project bridges traditional assets like real estate and art with blockchain, making them accessible to a wider audience. Priced at $0.175 in its ongoing presale, RXS has raised over $35.5 million, showcasing strong investor interest. Analysts predict its value could grow 10x to 12,000% by the end of 2025. The platform offers advanced tools, including a token builder for asset creation, a treasury for yield optimization, and GenAI-powered NFT creation, catering to diverse user needs. title: US CPI Comes in At 2.9%, Will Bitcoin Price and Crypto Market Slump Or Surge?
body: The crypto community has been eagerly awaiting the US Consumer Price Index (CPI) data as it marks a major economic event to influence the market. The US CPI report for December 2024 highlights that the inflation has increased to 2.9%, marking a 0.2% rise from the 2.7% recorded in November. As a result, Bitcoin price jumped above $98.5K level as it came in line with market expectations and the core CPI inflation rose less than expected. According to the latest report released by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics , the CPI of 2.9% indicates third consecutive increase in the index. Market estimates predicted that the CPI data would stay steady at 0.3% month-over-month. At the same time, there were estimations that the year-over-year (YoY) CPI to surge to 2.9% from last month‚Äôs 2.7%. While the Core CPI was predicted to cool at 0.2% from the previous month‚Äôs 0.3% mark, the data showed 0.2%. The YoY Core CPI, though estimated to remain unchanged at 3.3%, fell to 3.2%. US CPI and Federal Reserve‚Äôs Upcoming Rate Decision As reported by CoinGape, the US CPI inflation data , PPI and jobs data could influence the Federal Reserve‚Äôs interest rate decisions in the next FOMC meeting scheduled on January 28-29. Many alerted that inflationary pressures may lessen the possibility of a further reduction in the Fed‚Äôs interest rate. Meanwhile, the US Producer Price Index (PPI) data, released on January 24, eases the sentiment. The data revealed the inflation rate at 3.3%, lower than the expected range of 3.5%. The core PPI inflation rate also came cooler than the expected 3.8%, marking a rate of just 3.5%. An industry expert stated that the softer-than-expected inflation data from the US helped ‚Äúpause the recent surge in the US Treasury bond yields and boosted investors‚Äô appetite for riskier assets.‚Äù Though the US CPI and PPI reports signal a bearish sentiment, it needs to be seen how they would affect the global crypto market trends. The US dollar index ( DXY ) fell below 109, after a two-day high above 110 causing a recovery in Bitcoin price. Also, the 10-year Treasury yield decreased by 0.11% to 4.67%. Is a High Volatile Crypto Market Ahead? The crypto market is still vulnerable to high volatility and inflation before and after the inauguration of the incoming President Donald Trump on January 20. Though the community remains optimistic about Trump‚Äôs possible crypto-friendly policies, its impact on the market remains speculative. Trump‚Äôs crypto-focused developments, coupled with the US CPI and PPI reports, indicate a turbulent crypto space ahead. QCP Capital cautioned about the future volatility where both crypto and equity markets remain fragile. Warning against Bitcoin‚Äôs downward pressure, the platform stated, ‚ÄúWe maintain cautious of the downside as the $90k level in BTC has been tested numerous times.‚Äù However, BTC price has jumped 2% after the CPI data, with the price currently trading at $98,700. The 24-hour low and high are $95,330 and $98,650, respectively. The post US CPI Comes in At 2.9%, Will Bitcoin Price and Crypto Market Slump Or Surge? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: US inflation rises to 2.9%, far above Fed‚Äôs target. Bitcoin is in major trouble
body: The latest Consumer Price Index (CPI) figures for December have rattled markets, throwing the Federal Reserve‚Äôs inflation strategy into question. The U.S. Department of Labor reported a 0.4% increase in the monthly CPI after seasonal adjustment, overshooting the forecast of 0.3% and the previous value of 0.3%. On an annual basis, inflation climbed to 2.9%, up from 2.7% in November, the highest rate since July 2024. The Federal Open Market Committee ( FOMC ) has consistently communicated its intolerance for inflation exceeding the 2% target. While markets had hoped for a pause or even a reversal in rate hikes, these hopes have been dashed. And the crypto market, by all indications, just might be ‚Äòcooked.‚Äô Developing Story From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan
